  <script type="text/javascript">
   // =============================================================================
// Function Class: Show/Hide product promotions & special offers link
// =============================================================================

function showElement(id) {
  var elm = document.getElementById(id);
  if (elm) {
    elm.style.visibility = 'visible';
    if (elm.getAttribute('name') == 'heroQuickPromoDiv') {
      elm.style.display = 'block';
    }
  }
}
function hideElement(id) {
  var elm = document.getElementById(id);
  if (elm) {
    elm.style.visibility = 'hidden';
    if (elm.getAttribute('name') == 'heroQuickPromoDiv') {
      elm.style.display = 'none';
    }
  }
}
function showHideElement(h_id, div_id) {
  var hiddenTag = document.getElementById(h_id);
  if (hiddenTag) {
    showElement(div_id);
  } else {
    hideElement(div_id);
  }
}

    a=a.toLowerCase();
    var b=CSMReqs[a];
    if(b&&--b.c==0){
        if(typeof uet=='function'){uet(a);};
        if(b.e){amznJQ.completedStage(b.e);};
        if(typeof P != 'undefined'){P.register(b.p);};
    }
}

var addlongPoleTag = function(marker,customtag){
    marker=marker.toLowerCase();
    var b=CSMReqs[marker];
    if(b.c == 0){
        if(window.ue && typeof ue.tag === 'function') {
            ue.tag(customtag);
        }
    }
}

var dealNotifier = null;

      typeof window.navbar.getLightningDealsData == 'function') { 

    var lightningDealsData = window.navbar.getLightningDealsData();

      <script type="text/javascript">
       P.when("A","jQuery").execute(function(A,$) {
  var taf = $("#tell-a-friend");
  taf.children("[data-height]").click(function() {
        var height = $(this).attr("data-height");
        window.open(this.href, "_blank", "location=yes,width=700,height=" + height);
        return false;
  });

  A.on.load(function () {
    var hashValue = window.location.hash;
    var hashIndex;
    var swfHashValue = "_swftext_Swf";
    hashIndex = hashValue.indexOf(swfHashValue);
    if (hashValue != "" &&  hashIndex > -1) {
      $("#swfText").click();
    }
 });
});

             <div class="a-section a-spacing-none a-spacing-top-small feature" data-feature-name="fastTrack" data-template-name="GurupaContent" id="dp-fast-track_feature_div">
              <div class="a-row">
               <div class="a-section a-spacing-none" id="fast-track">
                <input id="ftSelectAsin" type="hidden" value="0553593714"/>
                <input id="ftSelectMerchant" type="hidden" value="ATVPDKIKX0DER"/>
                <div class="a-section a-spacing-none" id="fast-track-message">
                </div>
                <script type="text/javascript">
                 P.when("A", "jQuery").execute(function(A, $) {
            $("#quantity").live("change", function (event) {
                if (event.updateFTOnQuantityChange) {
                    return;
                }
                event.updateFTOnQuantityChange = 1;

                var quantity = $(this).val();
                var asin = $("#ftSelectAsin").val();
                var merchantId = $("#ftSelectMerchant").val();

                if (!asin || !merchantId) {
                    return;
                }

                var params = [];
                params.push("asin=" + asin);
                params.push("quantity=" + quantity);
                params.push("merchantId=" + merchantId);

                $.ajax({
                    type: "POST",
                    url: "/gp/product/features/dp-fast-track/udp-ajax-handler/get-quantity-update-message.html?ie=UTF8",
                    contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8',
                    data: params.join('&'),
                    dataType: "html",
                    success: function(objResponse) {
                        if (objResponse != null && objResponse != "") {
                            $("#fast-track-message").replaceWith(objResponse);
                        }
                    }
                });
                return;
            });
        });
                </script>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>

             <div class="a-box a-popover-loading">
              <div class="a-box-inner">
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="a-section a-hidden" id="atwl-dd-error-holder">
          <div class="a-section a-dropdown">
           <div class="a-section a-popover-wrapper">
            <div class="a-section a-spacing-base a-padding-base a-text-left a-popover-inner">
             <h3 class="a-color-error">
              Sorry, there was a problem.
             </h3>
             <span>
              There was an error retrieving your Wish Lists. Please try again.
             </span>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="a-section a-hidden" id="atwl-dd-unavail-holder">
          <div class="a-section a-dropdown">
           <div class="a-section a-popover-wrapper">
            <div class="a-section a-spacing-base a-padding-base a-text-left a-popover-inner">
             <h3 class="a-color-error">
              Sorry, there was a problem.
             </h3>
             <span>
              Wish List unavailable.
             </span>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <script type="text/javascript">
         amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() { 
            P.when("jQuery").execute(function($){
                var dropdownIds = "#add-to-registry-baby-button";
                
                var dropdowns = $(dropdownIds);
                dropdowns.each(function(){
                    var dropdown = jQuery(this);
                    
                    dropdown[0].name = "";
                    if(dropdown.css("cursor") != "not-allowed") {
                        var wlType = dropdown.attr("data-type");
                        var id = dropdown[0].id;
                        
                        var buttonWidth = "232";
                        dropdown.amazonPopoverTrigger({
                            ajaxSlideDuration: 0,
                            align: "left",
                            cacheable: true, 
                            closeEventInclude: "CLICK_OUTSIDE",
                            destination: "/gp/registry/reglist-popover.html?sprited=0&type=" + wlType,
                            group: "addToWishlist",
                            loadingContent: "<div style='padding: 4px 28px;'><img src='" + AmazonPopoverImages.loadingBar + "'/></div>", 
                            location: "bottom",
                            locationElement: "#" + id,
                            locationOffset: [-33,-5],
                            showOnHover: false,
                            skin: "<div id='wishlist-dropdown-content'><div class='ap_content'></div></div>",
                            
                            width: buttonWidth,
                            onFilled: function(popover) { 
                                
                                $(document).click();
                                popover.width(buttonWidth);
                                if (window.wlPop) { 
                                    setTimeout(function() { 
                                        wlPop.onFill(popover);
                                        popover.width(buttonWidth);
                                    }, 0); 
                                } 
                            }
                        });
                    }
                });  
            });
        });
        
        
        function setRegistryId(regStr) {
            var addToCart = jQuery("#addToCart");
            addToCart.find("[name='sourceCustomerOrgListID'],[name='colid'],[name='wlPopCommand']").attr('value', regStr);
            addToCart.find("[name='submit.add-to-registry.wishlist'],[name='submit.add-to-wishlist']").eq(0).click();
            return false;
        }
         
        function clearText(thefield){
            if (thefield.value==thefield.defaultValue)
            thefield.value = "";
        }
    

    
    
        P.when('A', 'a-popover').execute(function (A, popover) {
            var $ = A.$;
            var basePopoverId;
            var ajaxFailCount = 0;
            var wireDeclaratives = A.state('atwl').wireDeclaratives;

            
            var $atwlArrow = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonId);
            $atwlArrow.addClass('a-declarative');
            $atwlArrow.attr('data-action', 'atwl-splitbutton-arrow');
            var $atwlMain = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonSubmitId);
            $atwlMain.addClass('a-declarative');
            $atwlMain.attr('data-action', 'atwl-splitbutton-main');

            
            var CONST = {
                'widthStaticPopovers' : 230,
                'overflowWidth' : 10,
                'noOverflowWidth' : 10,
                'scrollbarWidth' : 17
            };

            
            function makeDropDownArrowInactive() {
                $('#wishListDropDown').removeClass('a-button-selected');
                $('#wishListMainButton').removeClass('a-button-selected');
            }

            
            function setAtwlState(options) {
                A.state('atwl', $.extend(A.state('atwl'), options));
            }
            
            function getDropDownHtml() {
                var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
                return atwlState.dropDownHtml;
            };
            
            function setDropDownHtml(dropDownHtml) {
                setAtwlState({dropDownHtml : dropDownHtml});
            };
            
            function resetDropDownHtml() {
                setDropDownHtml('');
            };
            setAtwlState({resetDropDownHtml : resetDropDownHtml});

            function isListOverflowing() {
                var $popoverWrapper = $('#atwl-dd-ul').parent();
                if ($popoverWrapper && $popoverWrapper.get(0)) {
                    var scrollHeight = $popoverWrapper.get(0).scrollHeight;
                    var height = $popoverWrapper.height();
                    var vertPadding = 2*parseInt($popoverWrapper.css('padding-top'));
                    return (scrollHeight > height + vertPadding);
                }
                return false;
            };

            function ie8NoScroll() {
                if (parseInt($.browser.version, 10) < 9 && document.body && document.body.parentElement) {
                    return !!(document.body.parentElement.scrollLeft || document.body.parentElement.scrollTop);
                }
                return false;
            };

            function adjustPopover($popover) {
                $popover.find('.a-button-close').hide();
                $popover.find('.a-popover-content').css({
                    'margin-right' : '0px'
                });
                $popover.css({
                    'padding' : '0'
                });
                $popover.find('.a-popover-inner').css({
                    'padding' : '0'
                });
                setTimeout(function () {
                    $popover.removeClass('a-arrow-bottom');
                    $('#atwl-rich-content').css({
                        'margin-bottom' :'0px',
                        'width' : 'auto'
                    });
                    
                    if ($.browser.msie) {
                        var $atwlMain = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonSubmitId);
                        var offset = $atwlMain.offset();
                        var height = $atwlMain.height();
                        var left = offset.left;
                        var top = offset.top + height;
                        if (ie8NoScroll()) {
                            left += document.body.parentElement.scrollLeft;
                            top += document.body.parentElement.scrollTop;
                        }
                        var listOverflow = isListOverflowing();
                        if (listOverflow) {
                            left -= 17;
                        }
                        $popover.css({
                            'left' : left + 'px',
                            'top' : top + 'px'
                        });
                    }
                }, 50);
            };

            
            function showStaticPopover(holder) {
                $('#' + holder).children().first().width(CONST.widthStaticPopovers);
                hideStaticPopover();
                var basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                if (!basePopover) {
                    basePopover = popover.create($('#add-to-wishlist-button-group'), {
                        content : $('#' + holder).html(),
                        name : 'atwl',
                        skin : function(content) {return content;},
                        activate : 'onmouseclick',
                        width : CONST.widthStaticPopovers,
                        position : 'triggerBottom'
                    });
                } else {
                    basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                }
                basePopover.update({
                    width : CONST.widthStaticPopovers,
                    content : $('#' + holder).html()
                });
                basePopoverId = basePopover.id;
                basePopover.show().updatePosition();
                var $popover = basePopover.$popover;
                adjustPopover($popover);
            };
            
            function hideStaticPopover() {
                if (basePopoverId) {
                    var basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                    if (basePopover) {
                        basePopover.hide();
                    }
                }
            };

            function showSpinner() {
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-spinner-holder');
            };

            function hideSpinner() {
                hideStaticPopover();
            };

            function showError() {
                makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                ajaxFailCount++;
                hideSpinner();
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-error-holder');
            };

            function hideError() {
                hideStaticPopover();
                return ajaxFailCount >= A.state('atwl').maxAjaxFailureCount;
            };

            function showUnavail() {
                hideSpinner();
                hideUnavail();
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-unavail-holder');
            };

            function hideUnavail() {
                hideStaticPopover();
            };

            
            function parseAjaxResponse(ajaxResponse) {
                makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                hideSpinner();
                try {
                    var response = A.parseJSON(ajaxResponse);
                } catch(e) {
                    showError();
                    return;
                }
                if (typeof response.html !== 'undefined' && response.css !== 'undefined') {
                    setDropDownHtml(response.html);
                    var dropDownCSS = response.css;
                    $('body').append(dropDownCSS);
                    showDropDown();
                } else {
                    showError();
                }
            };
            
            function adjustDropDownDimensions($popover) {
                var timeout;
                if (ie8NoScroll()) {
                    timeout = 50;
                } else {
                    timeout = 0;
                }
                setTimeout(function () {
                    var $inner = $('#atwl-popover-inner');
                    var innerWidth = $inner.width();
                    var listOverflow = isListOverflowing();
                    if (listOverflow) {
                        innerWidth += CONST.overflowWidth;
                    } else {
                        $('.atwl-dd-list-name').each(function(index) {
                            var $this = $(this);
                            $this.width($this.width() + CONST.noOverflowWidth);
                        });
                    }
                    var defaultList = $popover.find('ul li a.a-active').first();
                    defaultList.css('margin-left', '1px');
                    defaultList.parent().focus();
                    $inner.width(innerWidth);
                }, timeout);
            };
            
            function createDropDown() {
                var atwlPopover = popover.create($('#add-to-wishlist-button-group'), {
                    content : getDropDownHtml(),
                    name : 'atwl',
                    skin : function(content) {return content;},
                    activate : 'onmouseclick',
                    position : 'triggerBottom'
                });
                return atwlPopover;
            };
            
            function updateDropDown(atwlPopover) {
                atwlPopover.update({
                    content : getDropDownHtml(),
                    width : 'auto'
                });
                atwlPopover.show();
                adjustPopover(atwlPopover.$popover);
                adjustDropDownDimensions(atwlPopover.$popover);
            };
            
            function showDropDown() {
                var atwlPopover = popover.get('atwl');
                if (atwlPopover) {
                    if (atwlPopover.isActive()) {
                        atwlPopover.hide();
                        return;
                    } else {
                        
                        popover.remove(atwlPopover);
                    }
                } else {
                    
                    atwlPopover = createDropDown();
                    popover.remove(atwlPopover);
                }
                atwlPopover = createDropDown();
                updateDropDown(atwlPopover);
            };
            
            function setRegistryId(regID, regType) {
                if (typeof regType === 'undefined') {
                    regType = 'wishlist';
                }
                var regStr = 'pop_' + regID + '_' + regType;
                var addToCart = jQuery("#addToCart");
                addToCart.find("[name='sourceCustomerOrgListID'],[name='colid'],[name='wlPopCommand']").attr('value', regStr);
                setAtwlState({'inSubmit' : true});
                addToCart.find("[name='submit.add-to-registry.wishlist'],[name='submit.add-to-wishlist']").eq(0).click();
                return false;
            };
            
            if (!wireDeclaratives) {
                
                A.declarative('atwl-splitbutton-arrow', 'click', function (event) {
                    var $this = event.$target;
                    event.$event.preventDefault();
                    setTimeout(function () {
                        makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                    }, 0);
                    if ($this.css("cursor") == "not-allowed") {
                        return false;
                    }
                    if (hideError()) {
                        showUnavail();
                        return false;
                    }
                    var dropDownHtml = getDropDownHtml();
                    var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
                    if (!dropDownHtml || !dropDownHtml.length) {
                        showSpinner();
                        var data = event.data;
                        var urlParams = {
                            'sortMethod' : atwlState.sortMethod,
                            'type' : 'wishlist'
                        };
                        var url = '/gp/registry/atwl/popover.html?' + $.param(urlParams);
                        var params = {
                            'url' : url,
                            'cache' : false,
                            'success' : parseAjaxResponse,
                            'error' : showError
                        };
                        $.ajax(params);
                    } else {
                        showDropDown();
                    }
                    return false;
                });
                
                A.declarative('atwl-dd', 'click', function (event) {
                    event.$event.preventDefault();
                    var data = event.data;
                    setRegistryId(data.id, data.type);
                    return false;
                });
                
                A.declarative('atwl-kbp-landing', 'click', function (event) {
                    var data = event.data;
                    var asin = jQuery("#addToCart").find('#ASIN').val();
                    var href = data.url;
                    href += '&asin=' + asin;
                    window.open(href);
                    return false;
                });
            }

            var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
            if (atwlState && atwlState.sortMethod === 'kbp') {
                
                A.state('atwl', {
                    kbpPromo : {
                        mouseOver : false,
                        countDown : false
                    }
                });
                
                function showKbpPromoPopover(data) {
                    
                    if (data && data.promoEnabled) {
                        var html = data.html;
                        if (html) {
                            
                            var kbpPromoPopover = popover.create($atwlMain.parent(), {
                                name : 'kbpPromoPopover',
                                content : html,
                                position : 'triggerBottom',
                                width : data.width
                            });
                            kbpPromoPopover.show().lock();
                            
                            A.delay(function () {
                                var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                                var hide = !state.mouseOver;
                                if (hide) {
                                    kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                                    popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                                } else {
                                    state.countDown = true;
                                }
                                A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                            }, 10000);
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                A.ajax('/gp/toys/birthday/atwl-dpx.html', {
                    method : 'get',
                    cache : false,
                    params : {
                        isAUI : 1
                    },
                    success : showKbpPromoPopover,
                    error : function () {}
                });
                if (!wireDeclaratives) {
                    
                    A.declarative('atwl-kbp-promo-mouseover', 'mouseleave', function () {
                        var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                        state.mouseOver = false;
                        var hide = state.countDown;
                        if (hide) {
                            var kbpPromoPopover = popover.get('kbpPromoPopover');
                            if (kbpPromoPopover) {
                                kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                                popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                            }
                        }
                        A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                    });
                    
                    A.declarative('atwl-kbp-promo-mouseover', 'mouseenter', function () {
                        var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                        state.mouseOver = true;
                        A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                    });
                    
                    A.on('a:popover:hide:kbpPromoPopover', function () {
                        var kbpPromoPopover = popover.get('kbpPromoPopover');
                        kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                        popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                    });
                }
            }

            setAtwlState({wireDeclaratives : true});
        });
    
    
    
        P.when("A", "a-modal",'ready').execute(function(A, modal){
            var $ = A.$;

            var parseButtonType = function (btnClicked) {
                var btnName = btnClicked.attr("name");
                var btnNameParts = btnName.split('.');
                var re1 = /submit\.add-to-registry\./;
                var re2 = /submit\.add-to-/;
                if (btnName.match(re1)) {
                    return btnNameParts[2];
                } else if (btnName.match(re2)) {
                    var parts = btnNameParts[1].split("-");
                    return parts[2];
                }
                return '';
            };
        
            var parsePostData = function (action, btnType) {
                var form = $('#addToCart');
                var serArr = form.serializeArray();
                var data = {};
                var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                $.each(serArr, function (){
                    data[this.name] = this.value;
                });
                data['itemCount'] = data.quantity;
                data['sid'] = data['session-id'];
                data['cache'] = false;
                data['url'] = wishlistState[action + 'Url'];
    
                if (action === 'add') {
                    data.type = btnType;
                    data.caller = "aui";
                    data.sourceVendorId = "website.wishlist.detail.add";
                    data.streaming = wishlistState.streaming;
                } else if (action === 'create') {
                    data['create_sid'] = data.sid;
                    data['create_type'] = btnType;
                    data['create_sourceVendorId'] = "wishlist.createflow.assign";
                    data['create_nextAction'] = "add";
                    data['create_includeEmptyList'] = 1;
                    data['create_isFirst'] = wishlistState.isFirstCreate ? 1 : 0;
                    data.caller = "aui";
                }
                return data;
            };
        
            var forceFormSubmit = function (btnClicked) {     
                var btnName = btnClicked.attr('name');
                var form = btnClicked.parents('form');    
                var inputName = $('<input type="hidden" />').attr("name", btnName).val('1');
                form.append($(inputName));
                form.submit();
            };
        	
            var redirectToHUCPage = function() {
                var btnClicked = $('#add-wishlist-declarative').closest('.a-button').find('input');
                forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
            }
            
            if (!A.capabilities.touch) {
                $('#add-to-wishlist-button-submit').unbind("click").bind("click", function(event) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    
                    if ($(this).css("cursor") == "not-allowed") {
                        return false;
                    }
                    
                    var currentAction = "";
                    var dpState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    var popCommand = $("[name='wlPopCommand']").val();

                    if (popCommand !== "") {
                        
                        var popCommandParts = popCommand.split('_');
                        currentType = popCommandParts[2];
                        
                        
                        if ((currentType !== 'wishlist' && currentType !== 'giftlist' && currentType !== 'supplylist') ||
                               $('html').hasClass('a-lt-ie9'))  {
                            redirectToHUCPage();
                            return;
                        }
                        currentAction = (popCommandParts[1] === 'new') ? "create" : (popCommandParts[1] === 'default' && dpState.isFirstCreate) ? "create" : "add";
                    } else {
                        currentType = "wishlist";
                        currentAction =  dpState.isFirstCreate ? "create" : "add";
                        
                        if (currentAction === "add" && $('html').hasClass('a-lt-ie9')) {
                            redirectToHUCPage();
                            return;
                        }
                    }
                    A.state("wishlistDPState", {action: currentAction, type: currentType});
                    $('#add-wishlist-declarative').trigger("click");
                });
            }
        
            var clearPopCommandFields = function() {
                var popCommandFields = ['wlPopCommand'];
                for (var i = 0; i < popCommandFields.length; i++) {
                    var fieldName = popCommandFields[i];
                    var field = $('[name^="' + fieldName + '"]');
                    if (field && field.length) {
                        field.val("");
                    }
                }
            }
        
            var eventAlreadyBound = A.state('wishlistDPState').eventsBound;
        
            if (!eventAlreadyBound) {        
                A.on('a:popover:show:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    var popover = event.popover;
                    var $popover = popover.$popover;
                    var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    var action = wishlistState.action;
                    
                    $popover.addClass('pop-huc-' + action);
                    var btnClicked = popover.$trigger.closest('.a-button').find('input');
                    var btnType = wishlistState.type;
                    
                    btnClicked.closest('.a-button-selected').removeClass('a-button-selected');
                    
                    
                    var declarativeData = parsePostData(action, btnType);
                    var url = declarativeData.url;
                    var streaming = declarativeData.streaming;
                    var scope = "ajax_" + streaming;
                    var t0 = new Date();
                    if (window.ue) {
                        uet('tc', scope);
                    }
                    
                    var closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit = function() {
                        popover.hide();
                        forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
                    };
                    
                    var emitRawUEData = function() {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            uet("be", scope);
                            uex("ld", scope);
                        }
                    };
                    
                    var emitCF = function() {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            uet("cf", scope);
                        }
                    }
                    
                    var emitHitData = function(requestId, time, ctb) {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            ues("id", scope, requestId);
                            ues("t0", scope, time);
                            ues("ctb", scope, ctb);
                        }
                    };
                    
                    if (action === "create" || !streaming) {
                        A.ajax(url, {
                            method: 'post',
                            params: declarativeData,
                            success: function(response) {
                                if (response && response.html) {
                                    emitHitData(response.requestId, t0, "1"); 
                                    if (response.status && response.status === 'no-asins') {
                                        
                                        closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                    } else {
                                        
                                        popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').addClass('a-hidden');
                                        if (action === 'add') {
                                            popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                        } else {
                                            popover.$popover.find('#WLNEW_main').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                            
                                            var wlDropDownState = A.state('atwl');
                                            if (wlDropDownState && wlDropDownState.resetDropDownHtml ) {
                                                wlDropDownState.resetDropDownHtml();
                                            }
                                        }
                                        
                                        popover.updatePosition();
                                    }
                                    emitRawUEData(); 
                                } else {
                                    if (action === 'create') {
                                        forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
                                    }
                                    popover.hide();
                                }
                            },
                            error: closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit
                        });
                    } else {
 
                        var request = new XMLHttpRequest();
                        request.open("GET", declarativeData.url + "&" + A.$.param(declarativeData), true);
                        request.send(null);
                        var lastChunkIndex = 0;
                        
                        request.ontimeout = closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit;
                        
                        request.onerror = closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit;

                        request.onreadystatechange = function() {
                            try {
                                if (request.readyState > 2 && (typeof(request.status) != "unknown" && request.status === 200)
                                    && (typeof(request.response) !== 'undefined' || (typeof(request.responseText) != 'unknown' && typeof(request.responseText) !== 'undefined'))) {
                                    var jsons = [];
                                    if (typeof(request.response) !== 'undefined' && request.response !== null) {
                                        jsons = request.response.split(",,,");
                                    } else if (typeof(request.responseText) != 'unknown' && typeof(request.responseText) !== 'undefined' && request.responseText !== null) {
                                        jsons = request.responseText.split(",,,");
                                    }
                                    for (var index = lastChunkIndex; index < jsons.length ; index++) {
                                        var json = jsons[index];
                                        try {
                                            var response = A.parseJSON(json);
                                        } catch (e) {
                                            lastChunkIndex = index;
                                            break;
                                        }
                                        if (index === 0 && response && response.name === "skeleton") {
                                            
                                            if (response && response.html) {
                                                emitHitData(response.requestId, new Date(), "1");
                                                if (response.status && response.status === 'no-asins') {
                                                    
                                                    closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                                } else {
                                                    
                                                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').addClass('a-hidden');
                                                    popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                                }
                                            } 
                                        } else if(response && response.name && response.html && response.name !== "js") {
                                          popover.$popover.find('#' + response.name).html(response.html);
                                          
                                          if (index === 1) {
                                              emitCF();
                                          }                                      
                                        } else if(response && response.html){
                                          popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').append(response.html);
                                        }
                                        popover.updatePosition();
                                    }
                                    if (request.readyState === 4) {
                                        emitRawUEData();
                                    }
                                } else if(typeof(request.status) != 'unknown' && request.status !== 200) {
                                    closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                }
                            } catch (e) {
                                closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                            }
                        };
                    }
                    clearPopCommandFields();
                });
                
                A.on('a:popover:beforeShow:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    var popover = event.popover;
                    var $popover = popover.$popover;
                    var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    
                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').css({'margin': '10% 40%'});
                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').removeClass('a-hidden');
                    
                    popover.$popover.find('.wlAddCreatePop').html('').addClass('a-hidden');
                    
                    
                    var action = wishlistState.action;
                    popover.update({"width": wishlistState[action + 'Width'], "header": wishlistState[action + 'Header'], "height": wishlistState[action + 'Height']});
                    popover.updatePosition();
                });
                
                A.on('a:popover:hide:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    $('.a-modal-scroller').css({"visibility":"hidden"});            
                });
                
                A.state("wishlistDPState", {eventsBound: true});
            }
            clearPopCommandFields();
        });
        </script>
       </form>
      </div>
     </div>

      <script type="text/javascript">
       (function(){
	var insertCenterColStyle = function(width) {
		var totalWidth = width + 40,
		    style = document.createElement('style'),
		    head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0],
		    css = '#centerCol.centerColumn{margin-left:' + totalWidth + 'px !important;}';
		
		style.type = 'text/css';
		if(style.styleSheet) {
			style.styleSheet.cssText = css;
		} else {
			style.appendChild(document.createTextNode(css));
		}
		head.appendChild(style);
	};

	var maintainWidth = function() {
		var w = window.innerWidth || document.body.offsetWidth;
		if(w < 1150) {	
			var containerWidth = 200,
			    containerHeight = containerWidth / 0.75,
			    leftCol = document.getElementById("leftCol"),
			    imageBlock = document.getElementById("imageBlock"),
			    imageBlockContainer = document.getElementById("imageBlockContainer"),
			    frontImage = document.getElementById("imgBlkFront"),
			    imageCanvas = document.getElementById("img-canvas");
			        
	        leftCol.style.width = containerWidth + "px";
			imageBlock.style.width = containerWidth + "px";
			imageBlock.style.height = containerHeight + 40 + "px";
			imageBlockContainer.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
	        imageCanvas.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
	        frontImage.style.overflow = "hidden";
	    }
	    insertCenterColStyle(containerWidth);   
	};
	maintainWidth();
})();

P.when('A').register("ImageBlockATF", function(A){
	var audibleData = {};
	if(true){
		audibleData = {
			'audioSampleSrc' : "http://samples.audible.com/bk/rand/000349/bk_rand_000349_sample.mp3",
		    'flashPlayerUrl' : "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/zeitgeist/mp3player/swf/zgMp3Player-1.0._V212274098_.swf"
		}
	}
	var data = {
		
	    'litbData' : {
	    	'hasLitb' : true,
	    	'litbReftag' : "sib_dp_pt"
	    },
	    'audibleData' : audibleData,
	    'windowWidthThreshold' : 1150,
	    'configWidths' : [200, 260],
	    'holderRatio' : 0.75,
	    'containerMargin' : 15,
	    'flipLinkMinHeight' : 25,
	    'frontImageWidth' : 211,
	    'frontImageHeight' : 346,
	    'frontImageAspectRatio' : 0.6098265895953757,
	    'imageGalleryData' : [{"mainUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/5163N91r6lL.jpg","dimensions":[304,500],"thumbUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/5163N91r6lL._SX75_CR,0,0,75,75_.jpg"}],
	    'centerColMargin' : 40
	};
	return data;
});
      </script>

       amznJQ.onCompletion("amznJQ.criticalFeature", function() {
amznJQ.available("popover", function() {
    var acr = jQuery("#averageCustomerReviews");
    var dest = "/gp/customer-reviews/common/du/displayHistoPopAjax.html?ref=" + acr.attr("data-ref") +

        paddingBottom: 5,

        showCloseButton: true,

      <script type="text/javascript">
       P.register("DynamicIframe", function(){

function DynamicIframe(options) {
  
  var nTries = 0,
      MAX_TRIES = 20,
      iframeId = options.iframeId,
      encodedIframeContent = options.encodedIframeContent,
      iframeWrapperId = options.iframeWrapperId,
      initialResizeCallback = options.initialResizeCallback,
      iframeCSSId = "dynamic_iframe_CSS";
      iframeOverriddenCSSId = options.overriddenCSSId;
    
  this.createIframe = function() {
    var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
    iframe.id = iframeId;
    iframe.className = "ap_never_hide";
    iframe.width = "100%";
    iframe.scrolling = "no";
    iframe.frameBorder = "0";
    onloadFn = this.iframeload;
    
    if ( iframe.addEventListener )
      iframe.addEventListener("load", onloadFn, false);
    else if ( iframe.attachEvent )
      iframe.attachEvent("onload", onloadFn);
    else iframe.onload = onloadFn;
    
    var wrapper = document.getElementById(iframeWrapperId);
    wrapper.innerHTML = '';
    iframe = wrapper.appendChild(iframe);
    
    var overriddenCSS = "";
    if (document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId)) {
    	overriddenCSS = document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId).innerHTML;
    }
    
    var doc = iframe.contentWindow.document || iframe.contentDocument;
    if (doc && doc.open) {
      doc.open();

      doc.writeln('<html><body><style class="text/css">' + document.getElementById(iframeCSSId).innerHTML + overriddenCSS + '</style><div id="iframeContent">' + 
              '' + decodeURIComponent(encodedIframeContent) + '</'+'div>'+'</'+'body></html>');
      doc.close();
    }
  }
  
  this.iframeload = function () {
    var iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
    iframe.style.display = '';
    setTimeout(function () {
      setIframeHeight(initialResizeCallback);
    }, 20); 
  }
  
  function getDocHeight(doc) {
    var contentDiv = doc.getElementById("iframeContent");
    
    return Math.max(
    	contentDiv.scrollHeight,
    	contentDiv.offsetHeight,
    	contentDiv.clientHeight
    );
  }
  
  function setIframeHeight(resizeCallback) {
    var iframeDoc, iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
    iframeDoc = iframe.contentWindow.document || iframe.contentDocument;
    if (iframeDoc) {
      var h = getDocHeight(iframeDoc);
      if (h && h != 0) {
        iframe.style.height = parseInt(h) + 'px';
        if(typeof resizeCallback == "function") {
          resizeCallback(iframeId);	
        }
      } else if (nTries < MAX_TRIES) {
        nTries++;
        setTimeout(function () {
            setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);
        }, 50);
      }
    }
  }
  
  this.resizeIframe = function(resizeCallback) {
    nTries = 0;
	setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);
  }
}

return DynamicIframe;
});
      </script>
     </div>

}

       <div>
        <b>
         A NEW ORIGINAL SERIES, NOW ON HBO.
         <br/>
        </b>
        <br/>
        Here is the first volume in George R. R. Martinâ€™s magnificent cycle of novels that includes
        <i>
         A Clash of Kings
        </i>
        and
        <i>
         A Storm of Swords
        </i>
        . As a whole, this series comprises a genuine masterpiece of modern fantasy, bringing together the best the genre has to offer. Magic, mystery, intrigue, romance, and adventure fill these pages and transport us to a world unlike any we have ever experienced. Already hailed as a classic, George R. R. Martinâ€™s stunning series is destined to stand as one of the great achievements of imaginative fiction.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        <b>
         A GAME OF THRONES
         <br/>
         <br/>
        </b>
        Long ago, in a time forgotten, a preternatural event threw the seasons out of balance. In a land where summers can last decades and winters a lifetime, trouble is brewing. The cold is returning, and in the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are massing beyond the kingdomâ€™s protective Wall. At the center of the conflict lie the Starks of Winterfell, a family as harsh and unyielding as the land they were born to. Sweeping from a land of brutal cold to a distant summertime kingdom of epicurean plenty, here is a tale of lords and ladies, soldiers and sorcerers, assassins and bastards, who come together in a time of grim omens.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Here an enigmatic band of warriors bear swords of no human metal; a tribe of fierce wildlings carry men off into madness; a cruel young dragon prince barters his sister to win back his throne; and a determined woman undertakes the most treacherous of journeys. Amid plots and counterplots, tragedy and betrayal, victory and terror, the fate of the Starks, their allies, and their enemies hangs perilously in the balance, as each endeavors to win that deadliest of conflicts: the game of thrones.
       </div>

      <script type="text/javascript">
       P.when('DynamicIframe').execute(function(DynamicIframe){
	var BookDescriptionIframe = null,
	    bookDescEncodedData = "%3Cb%3EA%20NEW%20ORIGINAL%20SERIES%2C%20NOW%20ON%20HBO.%3Cbr%3E%3C%2Fb%3E%3Cbr%3EHere%20is%20the%20first%20volume%20in%20George%20R.%20R.%20Martin%26rsquo%3Bs%20magnificent%20cycle%20of%20novels%20that%20includes%20%3Ci%3EA%20Clash%20of%20Kings%3C%2Fi%3E%20and%20%3Ci%3EA%20Storm%20of%20Swords%3C%2Fi%3E.%20As%20a%20whole%2C%20this%20series%20comprises%20a%20genuine%20masterpiece%20of%20modern%20fantasy%2C%20bringing%20together%20the%20best%20the%20genre%20has%20to%20offer.%20Magic%2C%20mystery%2C%20intrigue%2C%20romance%2C%20and%20adventure%20fill%20these%20pages%20and%20transport%20us%20to%20a%20world%20unlike%20any%20we%20have%20ever%20experienced.%20Already%20hailed%20as%20a%20classic%2C%20George%20R.%20R.%20Martin%26rsquo%3Bs%20stunning%20series%20is%20destined%20to%20stand%20as%20one%20of%20the%20great%20achievements%20of%20imaginative%20fiction.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EA%20GAME%20OF%20THRONES%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3C%2Fb%3ELong%20ago%2C%20in%20a%20time%20forgotten%2C%20a%20preternatural%20event%20threw%20the%20seasons%20out%20of%20balance.%20In%20a%20land%20where%20summers%20can%20last%20decades%20and%20winters%20a%20lifetime%2C%20trouble%20is%20brewing.%20The%20cold%20is%20returning%2C%20and%20in%20the%20frozen%20wastes%20to%20the%20north%20of%20Winterfell%2C%20sinister%20and%20supernatural%20forces%20are%20massing%20beyond%20the%20kingdom%26rsquo%3Bs%20protective%20Wall.%20At%20the%20center%20of%20the%20conflict%20lie%20the%20Starks%20of%20Winterfell%2C%20a%20family%20as%20harsh%20and%20unyielding%20as%20the%20land%20they%20were%20born%20to.%20Sweeping%20from%20a%20land%20of%20brutal%20cold%20to%20a%20distant%20summertime%20kingdom%20of%20epicurean%20plenty%2C%20here%20is%20a%20tale%20of%20lords%20and%20ladies%2C%20soldiers%20and%20sorcerers%2C%20assassins%20and%20bastards%2C%20who%20come%20together%20in%20a%20time%20of%20grim%20omens.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHere%20an%20enigmatic%20band%20of%20warriors%20bear%20swords%20of%20no%20human%20metal%3B%20a%20tribe%20of%20fierce%20wildlings%20carry%20men%20off%20into%20madness%3B%20a%20cruel%20young%20dragon%20prince%20barters%20his%20sister%20to%20win%20back%20his%20throne%3B%20and%20a%20determined%20woman%20undertakes%20the%20most%20treacherous%20of%20journeys.%20Amid%20plots%20and%20counterplots%2C%20tragedy%20and%20betrayal%2C%20victory%20and%20terror%2C%20the%20fate%20of%20the%20Starks%2C%20their%20allies%2C%20and%20their%20enemies%20hangs%20perilously%20in%20the%20balance%2C%20as%20each%20endeavors%20to%20win%20that%20deadliest%20of%20conflicts%3A%20the%20game%20of%20thrones.",
	    bookDescriptionAvailableHeight,
	    minBookDescriptionInitialHeight = 112,
	    options = {};
	    
    function resizeCallback() {
       	var bdOffsetTop = document.getElementById("bookDescription_feature_div").offsetTop;
   		var imageBlockOffsetTop = document.getElementById("booksImageBlock_feature_div").offsetTop;
   		var imageBlockHeight = document.getElementById("booksImageBlock_feature_div").offsetHeight;
   		bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = imageBlockOffsetTop + imageBlockHeight -bdOffsetTop - 30;
   		if(bookDescriptionAvailableHeight < minBookDescriptionInitialHeight) {
   	        bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = minBookDescriptionInitialHeight;
   		}
    		
    	var psTotalHeight = document.getElementById("postBodyPS").offsetHeight;

    	if(psTotalHeight > bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 30){
    		if(document.getElementById("bdSeeLessPrompt").style.display == "none"){
    	    	document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 'px';
    	    	document.getElementById("psPlaceHolder").style.display ="block";
    	    	document.getElementById("bdSeeAllPrompt").style.display ="block";
    		}
    		else{
    			document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';
    		}
        }
        else{
        	document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';
        	document.getElementById("psPlaceHolder").style.display ="none";
        	document.getElementById("bdSeeAllPrompt").style.display ="block";
	    	document.getElementById("bdSeeLessPrompt").style.display ="none";
	    	document.getElementById("bdExpanderIcon").className = document.getElementById("bdExpanderIcon").className.replace("rotate","");
        }
    }
	    
	options.iframeId = "bookDesc_iframe";
	options.iframeWrapperId = "bookDesc_iframe_wrapper";
	options.overriddenCSSId = "bookDesc_override_CSS";
	options.encodedIframeContent = bookDescEncodedData;
	options.initialResizeCallback = resizeCallback;
	
	BookDescriptionIframe = new DynamicIframe(options);
	BookDescriptionIframe.createIframe();
	    
	if ((typeof BookDescriptionIframe != 'undefined') && (BookDescriptionIframe instanceof DynamicIframe)) {
	  P.when('jQuery').execute(function($) {
	    $(window).resize(function() {
	        BookDescriptionIframe.resizeIframe(resizeCallback);
	    });
	    $(window).bind('imageResize', function() {
	    	BookDescriptionIframe.resizeIframe(resizeCallback);
	    });
	  });
	}
});
      </script>
     </div>
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="andonCord" id="andonCord_feature_div">
     </div>
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="OosRecommendation" id="OosRecommendation_feature_div">
     </div>

    <script type="text/javascript">
     window.AmazonPopoverImages = {
  snake: 'http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/javascripts/lib/popover/images/snake._V192571611_.gif',
  btnClose: 'http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/javascripts/lib/popover/images/btn_close._V192188154_.gif',
  closeTan: 'http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/nav2/images/close-tan-sm._V192185930_.gif',
  closeTanDown: 'http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/nav2/images/close-tan-sm-dn._V192185961_.gif',
  loadingBar: 'http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/javascripts/lib/popover/images/loading-bar-small._V192188123_.gif',
  pixel: 'http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/icons/blank-pixel._V192192429_.gif'
};
var container = document.createElement("DIV");
container.id = "ap_container";
if (document.body.childNodes.length) {
    document.body.insertBefore(container, document.body.childNodes[0]);
} else {
    document.body.appendChild(container);
}
    </script>

             <div class="comment-quote">
              <div class="a-box comment-quote-bubble">
               <div class="a-box-inner">
                <div aria-live="polite" class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="80" style="max-height:80px; _height:80px">
                 <div aria-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content">
                  <p>
                   If you loved the fantasy setting of Game of Thrones, with all the political intrigue, you can't go wrong with the Engineer Trilogy. Every bit as intriguing as A Song of Ice and Fire, with well developed characters and a fascinating setting.
                  </p>

           </b>
           <script type="text/javascript">
            function acrPopoverHover(e, h) {
        if(h) window.acrAsinHover = e;
        else if(window.acrAsinHover == e) window.acrAsinHover = null;
      }

  amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() {
    (function($) {
      if($.fn.acrPopover) return;
      var popoverConfig = {
        showOnHover:true,
        showCloseButton: true,
        width: null,
        location:'bottom',
        locationAlign:'left',
        locationOffset:[-20,0],
        paddingLeft: 15,
        paddingBottom: 5,
        paddingRight: 15,
        group: 'reviewsPopover',
        clone:false,
        hoverHideDelay:300
      };

      $.fn.acrPopover = function() {
          return this.each(function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            if(!$this.data('init') && typeof $this.amazonPopoverTrigger === 'function') {
              $this.data('init', 1);
              var getargs = $this.attr('getargs');
              var ajaxURL = '/gp/customer-reviews/common/du/displayHistoPopAjax.html?' +
                         '&ASIN=' + $this.attr('name') +
                         '&link=1' +
                         '&seeall=1' +
                         '&ref=' + $this.attr('ref') +
                         ((typeof getargs != 'undefined') ? ('&getargs=' + getargs) : '');
              var myConfig = $.extend(true, { destination: ajaxURL }, popoverConfig);
              $this.amazonPopoverTrigger(myConfig);

              var w = window.acrAsinHover;
              if(w && $(w).parents('.asinReviewsSummary').get(0) == this) {
                $this.trigger('mouseover.amzPopover');
                window.acrAsinHover = null;
              }
            }
        });
      };

      window.reviewHistPopoverConfig = popoverConfig;
      var jqInit = window.jQueryInitHistoPopovers = function(asin) {
        if (typeof $('.acr-popover[name=' + asin + ']').acrPopover === 'function') {
          $('.acr-popover[name=' + asin + ']').acrPopover();
        }
      };
      window.doInit_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onAjaxUpdate_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onCacheUpdate_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onCacheUpdateReselect_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;

      amznJQ.onCompletion('amznJQ.criticalFeature', function() {
          setTimeout(function() { amznJQ.declareAvailable('acrPopover'); }, 10);
      });
    })(jQuery);
  });
  amznJQ.onReady('acrPopover', function() {
    jQuery('.acr-popover,#searchTemplate .asinReviewsSummary').each(function() {
      if (typeof jQuery(this).acrPopover === 'function') {
        jQuery(this).acrPopover();
      }
    });
  });
           </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() {
    jQuery("#ns_11Y5TMZSMEXM1D4K0JCE_1179_1_hmd_pricing_feedback_trigger_product-detail").amazonPopoverTrigger({

    <div class="bucket" id="productDescription">
     <h2>
      Editorial Reviews
     </h2>
     <div class="content">
      <h3 class="productDescriptionSource">
       Amazon.com Review
      </h3>
      <div class="productDescriptionWrapper">
       Readers of epic fantasy series are: (1) patient--they are left in suspense between each volume, (2) persistent--they reread or at least review the previous book(s) when a new installment comes out, (3) strong--these 700-page doorstoppers are
       <i>
        heavy
       </i>
       , and (4) mentally agile--they follow a host of characters through a myriad of subplots. In
       <i>
        A Game of Thrones
       </i>
       , the first book of a projected six, George R.R. Martin rewards readers with a vividly real world, well-drawn characters, complex but coherent plotting, and beautifully constructed prose, which
       <i>
        Locus
       </i>
       called "well above the norms of the genre."
       <p>
        Martin's Seven Kingdoms resemble England during the Wars of the Roses, with the Stark and Lannister families standing in for the Yorks and Lancasters.  The story of these two families and their struggle to control the Iron Throne dominates the foreground; in the background is a huge, ancient wall marking the northern border, beyond which barbarians, ice vampires, and direwolves menace the south as years-long winter advances.  Abroad, a dragon princess lives among horse nomads and dreams of fiery reconquest.
       </p>
       <p>
        There is much bloodshed, cruelty, and death, but
        <i>
         A Game of Thrones
        </i>
        is nevertheless compelling; it garnered a Nebula nomination and won the 1996 Locus Award for Best Fantasy Novel. So, on to
        <i>
         <a href="/exec/obidos/ASIN/0553108034/${0}">
          A Clash of Kings
         </a>
        </i>
        !
        <i>
         --Nona Vero
        </i>
        <em>
         --This text refers to an alternate
         <a class="product" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/0553573403/ref=dp_proddesc_1?ie=UTF8&amp;n=283155">
          Mass Market Paperback
         </a>
         edition.
        </em>
       </p>
       <div class="emptyClear">
       </div>
      </div>
      <h3 class="productDescriptionSource">
       From Publishers Weekly
      </h3>
      <div class="productDescriptionWrapper">
       In a world where the approaching winter will last four decades, kings and queens, knights and renegades struggle for control of a throne. Some fight with sword and mace, others with magic and poison. Beyond the Wall to the north, meanwhile, the Others are preparing their army of the dead to march south as the warmth of summer drains from the land. After more than a decade devoted primarily to TV and screen work, Martin (The Armageddon Rag, 1983) makes a triumphant return to high fantasy with this extraordinarily rich new novel, the first of a trilogy. Although conventional in form, the book stands out from similar work by Eddings, Brooks and others by virtue of its superbly developed characters, accomplished prose and sheer bloody-mindedness. Although the romance of chivalry is central to the culture of the Seven Kingdoms, and tournaments, derring-do and handsome knights abound, these trappings merely give cover to dangerous men and women who will stop at nothing to achieve their goals. When Lord Stark of Winterfell, an honest man, comes south to act as the King's chief councilor, no amount of heroism or good intentions can keep the realm under control. It is fascinating to watch Martin's characters mature and grow, particularly Stark's children, who stand at the center of the book. Martin's trophy case is already stuffed with major prizes, including Hugos, Nebulas, Locus Awards and a Bram Stoker. He's probably going to have to add another shelf, at least. Major ad/promo.
       <br/>
       Copyright 1996 Reed Business Information, Inc.
       <em>
        --This text refers to the
        <a class="product" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/0553103547/ref=dp_proddesc_2?ie=UTF8&amp;n=283155">
         Hardcover
        </a>
        edition.
       </em>
       <div class="emptyClear">
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="seeAll">
       <a href="http://www.amazon.com/Game-Thrones-Song-Fire-Book/dp/product-description/0553593714/ref=dp_proddesc_0?ie=UTF8&amp;n=283155&amp;s=books">
        See all Editorial Reviews
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>

var ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_so;	   


function ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_loadSwf_Core(swfLocation, swfWidth, swfHeight, flashVersion, bgColor, swfParams, flashParams, embedAttributes) {

  try {
      ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_so = new SWFObject(swfLocation, "ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_AMPlayerProd", swfWidth, swfHeight, flashVersion, bgColor);	   

      for (var v in swfParams) {
        ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_so.addVariable(v, encodeURIComponent(swfParams[v]));
      }
      for (var v in flashParams) {
        ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_so.addParam(v, flashParams[v]);
      }
      for (var v in embedAttributes) {
        ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_so.setAttribute(v, embedAttributes[v]);
      }

      ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_so.addVariable("swfEmbedTime", new Date().getTime());

      var agt = navigator.userAgent;
       
      var reFirefox = new RegExp("firefox/", "i");
      var regx = agt.split(reFirefox);
      var ffVersion = 8;
      if (regx[1]) {
          var pts = regx[1].split(/[.]/);
          ffVersion = parseFloat(pts[0] + "." + pts[1]);
      }
      var minorVersion = parseFloat(navigator.ap);
      if ((navigator.appVersion.indexOf("Mac")!=-1) || (ffVersion < 1.5)) {
          ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_so.setAttribute("height", swfHeight);
          ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_so.setAttribute("width", swfWidth);
          ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_so.addVariable("oldFirefox", "1");	     
      }

      if (ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_so.write("ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_flashcontent")) {
          fp_resizePlayerSpace('ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_', 
                               320, 
                               283);
      }
      else {
          var nsPrefix = 'ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_';

          fp_resizePlayerSpace(nsPrefix, 0, 0);
          fp_rewriteDiv(nsPrefix, "flashcontent", '<br/>To view this video download <a target="_blank" href="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer" target="_top">Flash Player</a> (version 9.0.115 or higher)');
      }
  } catch(err) {
      fp_resizePlayerSpace('ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_', 0, 0);
  }
  return false;
}



function _ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_loadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) {
    var swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf";
    var swfWidth = "320";
    var swfHeight = "100%";
    var flashVersion = "9.0.115";
    var bgColor = "#FFFFFF";

    var swfParams = {};
    var flashParams = {};
    var embedAttributes = {};
    swfParams.amazonPort = "80";
    swfParams.allowFullScreen = "true";
    swfParams.nsPrefix = "ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_";
    swfParams.locale = "en_US";
    swfParams.logUrl = "gp/mpd/l";
    swfParams.canResize = "1";
    swfParams.autoPlay = "1";
    swfParams.sessionId = "183-6149523-2214366";
    swfParams.marketplaceID = "ATVPDKIKX0DER";
    swfParams.salign = "LT";
    swfParams.asin = "0553593714";
    swfParams.preset = "detail";
    swfParams.mediaObjectId = "m3E9FHORY7HT4V";
    swfParams.autoPlayTimer = "";
    swfParams.mediaObjectIDList = "m3E9FHORY7HT4V";
    swfParams.playIsUserGenerated = "1";
    swfParams.permUrl = "gp/mpd/permalink";
    swfParams.xmlUrl = "http://www.amazon.com/gp/mpd/getplaylist-v2/m3E9FHORY7HT4V/183-6149523-2214366";
    swfParams.amazonServer = "www.amazon.com";
    swfParams.scale = "noscale";
    swfParams.amazonAmbLink = "/foo.html/ref=XLX";
    flashParams.allowFullScreen = "true";
    flashParams.salign = "LT";
    flashParams.bgcolor = "#FFFFFF";
    flashParams.allowScriptAccess = "always";
    flashParams.quality = "high";
    flashParams.wmode = "transparent";
    embedAttributes.title = "Flash Player";

    if (movieID){
      if (playerVersion == '3'){
        swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf";
        swfParams.mediaObjectIDList = movieID;
      } else {
        swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/legacy/20101014901/AMPlayerProd._V197491872_.swf";
      }
      swfParams.xmlUrl = "http://www.amazon.com/gp/mpd/getplaylist-v2/" + movieID + "/183-6149523-2214366";
      flashParams.wmode = "transparent";
      swfParams.autoPlay = "1";
    }

    if (document.getElementById('ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_duration')) {
      document.getElementById('ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_duration').style.display='none';
    }
    ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_loadSwf_Core(swfLocation, swfWidth, swfHeight, flashVersion, bgColor, swfParams, flashParams, embedAttributes);

  return false;
}

function ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_loadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) {
if (typeof amznJQ != "undefined") {
   amznJQ.available('swfobjectJS', function() { _ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_loadSwf(movieID, playerVersion); });
   return false;
} else {
   return _ns_04WN7VHMX9FPHDT5WY2F_948_loadSwf(movieID, playerVersion);
}

       <div class="a-section" id="revMHLContainerChild">
        <div class="a-row">
         <div class="a-column a-span11" id="revMH">
          <h3 class="a-spacing-small">
           Most Helpful Customer Reviews
          </h3>
          <div class="a-section" id="revMHRL">
           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R1T5UD2858KHTO">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              4,978 of 5,217 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R1T5UD2858KHTO/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0553593714&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="5.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R1T5UD2858KHTO/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0553593714&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                Well plotted and paced; excellent, fresh fantasy tale
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/A1AFXJ8U72MD6L/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                MISTER SJEM
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="cr-popup" data-cr-popup='{"width":340,"title":"AmazonHelp","height":340}' style="display:inline;">
               <span class="a-size-micro">
                <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_bdg_help?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=14279681&amp;pop-up=1#tr">
                 <span class="a-color-link c7yBadgeAUI c7yTopDownDashedStrike a-text-bold">
                  TOP 1000 REVIEWER
                 </span>
                </a>
               </span>
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on May 9, 2001
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R1T5UD2858KHTO">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Mass Market Paperback
              <i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator">
              </i>
             </span>
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">
              Verified Purchase
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              <span class="MHRHead">
               First off, I'm a heavy duty fan of GRRM. I've read over a 100 different  fantasy authors in my time (started at 12; I'm now 32). Took about 5  years off from the genre b/c I felt it was all getting too formulaic and  cliched.
               <br/>
               So, when I came back to fantasy at the end of 1999, I read the usual:  Goodkind, Jordan, etc. and then someone told me about GRRM and  man, that was the kicker!
               <br/>
               Here are the reasons to choose GRRM. I've also listed the reasons not to  choose him to make it fair b/c I know their are certain personalities who  won't like this series:
               <br/>
               WHY TO READ GRRM
               <br/>
               (1) YOU ARE TIRED OF FORMULAIC FANTASY: good lad beats  the dark lord against impossible odds; boy is the epitome of good; he and  all his friends never die even though they go through great dangers . . . the  good and noble king; the beautiful princess who falls in love with the  commoner boy even though their stations are drastically different  . . . you get the idea.  After reading this over and over, it gets old.
               <br/>
               (2) YOU ARE TIRED OF ALL THE HEROES STAYING ALIVE  EVEN THOUGH THEY ARE UNDER CONSTANT DANGER: this  gets even worse where the author kills a main hero off but that person  comes back later in the story. Or, a hero does die but magic brings him  back.
               <br/>
               This sometimes carries to minor characters where even they may not die,  but most fantasy authors like to kill them off to show that some risked the  adventure and perished.
               <br/>
               (3) YOU ARE A MEDIEVAL HISTORY BUFF: this story was  influenced by the WARS OF THE ROSES and THE HUNDRED  YEARS WAR.
               <br/>
               (4) YOU LOVE SERIOUS INTRIGUE WITHOUT STUPID  OPPONENTS: lots of layering; lots of intrigue; lots of clever players in  the game of thrones.
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="columnbalancing-showfullreview" data-columnbalancing-showfullreview="{&quot;rest&quot;:&quot; Unlike other fantasy novels, one side, usually the  villain, is stupid or not too bright.&lt;br /&gt;  (5) YOU ARE INTERESTED IN BIASED OPINIONS AND  DIFFERENT TRUTHS: GRRM has set this up where each chapter has  the title of one character and the whole chapter is through their viewpoint.  Interesting tidbit is that you get their perception of events or truths. But, if  you pay attention, someone else will mention a different angle of truth in  the story that we rarely see in other novels. Lastly and most importantly,  GRRM doesn't try to tell us which person is right in their perception. He  purposelly leaves it vague so that we are kept guessing.&lt;br /&gt;  (6) LEGENDS: some of the most interesting characters are those who are  long gone or dead. We never get the entire story but only bits and pieces;  something that other fantasy authors could learn from to heighten  suspense. Additionally, b/c the points of views are not congruent, we  sometimes get different opinions.&lt;br /&gt;  (7) WORDPLAY: if you're big on metaphors and description, GRRM is  your guy. Almost flawless flow.&lt;br /&gt;  (8) LOTS OF CONFLICT: all types, too; not just fighting but between  characters through threats and intrigue.&lt;br /&gt;  (9) MULTILAYERED PLOTTING; SUB PLOTS GALORE: each  character has their own separate storyline; especially as the story  continues and everyone gets scattered. This is one of the reasons why  each novel is between 700-900 pages.&lt;br /&gt;  (10) SUPERLATIVE VARIED CHARACTERS: not the typical  archetypes that we are used to in most fantasy; some are gritty; few are  totally evil or good; GRRM does a great job of changing our opinions of  characters as the series progress. This is especially true of Jaime in book  three.&lt;br /&gt;  (11) REALISTIC MEDIEVAL DIALOGUE: not to the point that we  can't understand it but well done.&lt;br /&gt;  (12) HEAPS OF SYMOBLISM AND PROPHECY: if you're big on  that.&lt;br /&gt;  (13) EXCELLENT MYSTERIES: very hard to figure out the culprits;  GRRM must have read a lot of mystery novels.&lt;br /&gt;  (14) RICHLY TEXTURED FEMALE CHARACTERS: best male  author on female characters I have read; realistic on how women think,  too.&lt;br /&gt;  (15) LOW MAGIC WORLD: magic is low key; not over the top so  heroes can't get out of jams with it.&lt;br /&gt;  REASON TO NOT READ GRRM&lt;br /&gt;  (1) YOU LIKE YOUR MAIN CHARACTERS: GRRM does a good  job of creating more likeable characters after a few die. But, if that isn't  your style, you shouldn't be reading it. He kills off several, not just one, so  be warned.&lt;br /&gt;  (2) DO NOT CARE FOR GRITTY GRAY CHARACTERS: if you like  more white and gray characters, this may unsettle you. I suggest Feist or  Goodkind or Dragonlance if you want a more straight forward story with  strong archetypes.&lt;br /&gt;  (3) MULTIPLE POINTS OF VIEWS TURN YOU OFF: if you prefer  that the POVS only go to a few characters, this might be confusing for  you.&lt;br /&gt;  (4) SWEARING, SEX: there's a lot of it in this book just as there is in  real life.&lt;br /&gt;  (5) YOU DEMAND CLOSURE AT THE END OF EVERY BOOK:  this isn't the case for all stories in the series. Some are still going on; some  have been resolved; others have been created and are moving on.&lt;br /&gt;  (6) IF YOU WANT A TARGET OR SOMEONE TO BLAME: this can  be done to some extent but not as much. This is b/c he doesn't try to  make anyone necessarily good or evil.&lt;br /&gt;  (7) ARCHETYPES: some readers like archetypal characters because it's  comfortable; we like the good young hero (sort of like Pug in Feist's THE  RIFTWAR SAGA); it's familiar and we sometimes like to pretend we're  this upcoming, great hero. You wont' get much of this in GRRM with the  exception of one or two characters.&lt;br /&gt;  (8) LENGTH: you don't want to get into a long fantasy epic series. In that  case, look for shorters works as this is biiig.&lt;br /&gt;  (9) PATRIARCHY: men are most of the main characters with lots of  power (one female exception). ....&quot;}">
               <a class="a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/Game-Thrones-Song-Fire-Book/product-reviews/0553593714/ref=cm_cr_dp_text?ie=UTF8&amp;showViewpoints=0&amp;sortBy=byRankDescending#R1T5UD2858KHTO">
                <span class="a-letter-space">
                </span>
                Read more â€º
               </a>
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>
