        <script type="text/javascript">
         amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() { 
            P.when("jQuery").execute(function($){
                var dropdownIds = "#add-to-registry-baby-button";
                
                var dropdowns = $(dropdownIds);
                dropdowns.each(function(){
                    var dropdown = jQuery(this);
                    
                    dropdown[0].name = "";
                    if(dropdown.css("cursor") != "not-allowed") {
                        var wlType = dropdown.attr("data-type");
                        var id = dropdown[0].id;
                        
                        var buttonWidth = "232";
                        dropdown.amazonPopoverTrigger({
                            ajaxSlideDuration: 0,
                            align: "left",
                            cacheable: true, 
                            closeEventInclude: "CLICK_OUTSIDE",
                            destination: "/gp/registry/reglist-popover.html?sprited=0&type=" + wlType,
                            group: "addToWishlist",
                            loadingContent: "<div style='padding: 4px 28px;'><img src='" + AmazonPopoverImages.loadingBar + "'/></div>", 
                            location: "bottom",
                            locationElement: "#" + id,
                            locationOffset: [-33,-5],
                            showOnHover: false,
                            skin: "<div id='wishlist-dropdown-content'><div class='ap_content'></div></div>",
                            
                            width: buttonWidth,
                            onFilled: function(popover) { 
                                
                                $(document).click();
                                popover.width(buttonWidth);
                                if (window.wlPop) { 
                                    setTimeout(function() { 
                                        wlPop.onFill(popover);
                                        popover.width(buttonWidth);
                                    }, 0); 
                                } 
                            }
                        });
                    }
                });  
            });
        });
        
        
        function setRegistryId(regStr) {
            var addToCart = jQuery("#addToCart");
            addToCart.find("[name='sourceCustomerOrgListID'],[name='colid'],[name='wlPopCommand']").attr('value', regStr);
            addToCart.find("[name='submit.add-to-registry.wishlist'],[name='submit.add-to-wishlist']").eq(0).click();
            return false;
        }
         
        function clearText(thefield){
            if (thefield.value==thefield.defaultValue)
            thefield.value = "";
        }
    

    
    
        P.when('A', 'a-popover').execute(function (A, popover) {
            var $ = A.$;
            var basePopoverId;
            var ajaxFailCount = 0;
            var wireDeclaratives = A.state('atwl').wireDeclaratives;

            
            var $atwlArrow = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonId);
            $atwlArrow.addClass('a-declarative');
            $atwlArrow.attr('data-action', 'atwl-splitbutton-arrow');
            var $atwlMain = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonSubmitId);
            $atwlMain.addClass('a-declarative');
            $atwlMain.attr('data-action', 'atwl-splitbutton-main');

            
            var CONST = {
                'widthStaticPopovers' : 230,
                'overflowWidth' : 10,
                'noOverflowWidth' : 10,
                'scrollbarWidth' : 17
            };

            
            function makeDropDownArrowInactive() {
                $('#wishListDropDown').removeClass('a-button-selected');
                $('#wishListMainButton').removeClass('a-button-selected');
            }

            
            function setAtwlState(options) {
                A.state('atwl', $.extend(A.state('atwl'), options));
            }
            
            function getDropDownHtml() {
                var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
                return atwlState.dropDownHtml;
            };
            
            function setDropDownHtml(dropDownHtml) {
                setAtwlState({dropDownHtml : dropDownHtml});
            };
            
            function resetDropDownHtml() {
                setDropDownHtml('');
            };
            setAtwlState({resetDropDownHtml : resetDropDownHtml});

            function isListOverflowing() {
                var $popoverWrapper = $('#atwl-dd-ul').parent();
                if ($popoverWrapper && $popoverWrapper.get(0)) {
                    var scrollHeight = $popoverWrapper.get(0).scrollHeight;
                    var height = $popoverWrapper.height();
                    var vertPadding = 2*parseInt($popoverWrapper.css('padding-top'));
                    return (scrollHeight > height + vertPadding);
                }
                return false;
            };

            function ie8NoScroll() {
                if (parseInt($.browser.version, 10) < 9 && document.body && document.body.parentElement) {
                    return !!(document.body.parentElement.scrollLeft || document.body.parentElement.scrollTop);
                }
                return false;
            };

            function adjustPopover($popover) {
                $popover.find('.a-button-close').hide();
                $popover.find('.a-popover-content').css({
                    'margin-right' : '0px'
                });
                $popover.css({
                    'padding' : '0'
                });
                $popover.find('.a-popover-inner').css({
                    'padding' : '0'
                });
                setTimeout(function () {
                    $popover.removeClass('a-arrow-bottom');
                    $('#atwl-rich-content').css({
                        'margin-bottom' :'0px',
                        'width' : 'auto'
                    });
                    
                    if ($.browser.msie) {
                        var $atwlMain = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonSubmitId);
                        var offset = $atwlMain.offset();
                        var height = $atwlMain.height();
                        var left = offset.left;
                        var top = offset.top + height;
                        if (ie8NoScroll()) {
                            left += document.body.parentElement.scrollLeft;
                            top += document.body.parentElement.scrollTop;
                        }
                        var listOverflow = isListOverflowing();
                        if (listOverflow) {
                            left -= 17;
                        }
                        $popover.css({
                            'left' : left + 'px',
                            'top' : top + 'px'
                        });
                    }
                }, 50);
            };

            
            function showStaticPopover(holder) {
                $('#' + holder).children().first().width(CONST.widthStaticPopovers);
                hideStaticPopover();
                var basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                if (!basePopover) {
                    basePopover = popover.create($('#add-to-wishlist-button-group'), {
                        content : $('#' + holder).html(),
                        name : 'atwl',
                        skin : function(content) {return content;},
                        activate : 'onmouseclick',
                        width : CONST.widthStaticPopovers,
                        position : 'triggerBottom'
                    });
                } else {
                    basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                }
                basePopover.update({
                    width : CONST.widthStaticPopovers,
                    content : $('#' + holder).html()
                });
                basePopoverId = basePopover.id;
                basePopover.show().updatePosition();
                var $popover = basePopover.$popover;
                adjustPopover($popover);
            };
            
            function hideStaticPopover() {
                if (basePopoverId) {
                    var basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                    if (basePopover) {
                        basePopover.hide();
                    }
                }
            };

            function showSpinner() {
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-spinner-holder');
            };

            function hideSpinner() {
                hideStaticPopover();
            };

            function showError() {
                makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                ajaxFailCount++;
                hideSpinner();
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-error-holder');
            };

            function hideError() {
                hideStaticPopover();
                return ajaxFailCount >= A.state('atwl').maxAjaxFailureCount;
            };

            function showUnavail() {
                hideSpinner();
                hideUnavail();
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-unavail-holder');
            };

            function hideUnavail() {
                hideStaticPopover();
            };

            
            function parseAjaxResponse(ajaxResponse) {
                makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                hideSpinner();
                try {
                    var response = A.parseJSON(ajaxResponse);
                } catch(e) {
                    showError();
                    return;
                }
                if (typeof response.html !== 'undefined' && response.css !== 'undefined') {
                    setDropDownHtml(response.html);
                    var dropDownCSS = response.css;
                    $('body').append(dropDownCSS);
                    showDropDown();
                } else {
                    showError();
                }
            };
            
            function adjustDropDownDimensions($popover) {
                var timeout;
                if (ie8NoScroll()) {
                    timeout = 50;
                } else {
                    timeout = 0;
                }
                setTimeout(function () {
                    var $inner = $('#atwl-popover-inner');
                    var innerWidth = $inner.width();
                    var listOverflow = isListOverflowing();
                    if (listOverflow) {
                        innerWidth += CONST.overflowWidth;
                    } else {
                        $('.atwl-dd-list-name').each(function(index) {
                            var $this = $(this);
                            $this.width($this.width() + CONST.noOverflowWidth);
                        });
                    }
                    var defaultList = $popover.find('ul li a.a-active').first();
                    defaultList.css('margin-left', '1px');
                    defaultList.parent().focus();
                    $inner.width(innerWidth);
                }, timeout);
            };
            
            function createDropDown() {
                var atwlPopover = popover.create($('#add-to-wishlist-button-group'), {
                    content : getDropDownHtml(),
                    name : 'atwl',
                    skin : function(content) {return content;},
                    activate : 'onmouseclick',
                    position : 'triggerBottom'
                });
                return atwlPopover;
            };
            
            function updateDropDown(atwlPopover) {
                atwlPopover.update({
                    content : getDropDownHtml(),
                    width : 'auto'
                });
                atwlPopover.show();
                adjustPopover(atwlPopover.$popover);
                adjustDropDownDimensions(atwlPopover.$popover);
            };
            
            function showDropDown() {
                var atwlPopover = popover.get('atwl');
                if (atwlPopover) {
                    if (atwlPopover.isActive()) {
                        atwlPopover.hide();
                        return;
                    } else {
                        
                        popover.remove(atwlPopover);
                    }
                } else {
                    
                    atwlPopover = createDropDown();
                    popover.remove(atwlPopover);
                }
                atwlPopover = createDropDown();
                updateDropDown(atwlPopover);
            };
            
            function setRegistryId(regID, regType) {
                if (typeof regType === 'undefined') {
                    regType = 'wishlist';
                }
                var regStr = 'pop_' + regID + '_' + regType;
                var addToCart = jQuery("#addToCart");
                addToCart.find("[name='sourceCustomerOrgListID'],[name='colid'],[name='wlPopCommand']").attr('value', regStr);
                setAtwlState({'inSubmit' : true});
                addToCart.find("[name='submit.add-to-registry.wishlist'],[name='submit.add-to-wishlist']").eq(0).click();
                return false;
            };
            
            if (!wireDeclaratives) {
                
                A.declarative('atwl-splitbutton-arrow', 'click', function (event) {
                    var $this = event.$target;
                    event.$event.preventDefault();
                    setTimeout(function () {
                        makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                    }, 0);
                    if ($this.css("cursor") == "not-allowed") {
                        return false;
                    }
                    if (hideError()) {
                        showUnavail();
                        return false;
                    }
                    var dropDownHtml = getDropDownHtml();
                    var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
                    if (!dropDownHtml || !dropDownHtml.length) {
                        showSpinner();
                        var data = event.data;
                        var urlParams = {
                            'sortMethod' : atwlState.sortMethod,
                            'type' : 'wishlist'
                        };
                        var url = '/gp/registry/atwl/popover.html?' + $.param(urlParams);
                        var params = {
                            'url' : url,
                            'cache' : false,
                            'success' : parseAjaxResponse,
                            'error' : showError
                        };
                        $.ajax(params);
                    } else {
                        showDropDown();
                    }
                    return false;
                });
                
                A.declarative('atwl-dd', 'click', function (event) {
                    event.$event.preventDefault();
                    var data = event.data;
                    setRegistryId(data.id, data.type);
                    return false;
                });
                
                A.declarative('atwl-kbp-landing', 'click', function (event) {
                    var data = event.data;
                    var asin = jQuery("#addToCart").find('#ASIN').val();
                    var href = data.url;
                    href += '&asin=' + asin;
                    window.open(href);
                    return false;
                });
            }

            var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
            if (atwlState && atwlState.sortMethod === 'kbp') {
                
                A.state('atwl', {
                    kbpPromo : {
                        mouseOver : false,
                        countDown : false
                    }
                });
                
                function showKbpPromoPopover(data) {
                    
                    if (data && data.promoEnabled) {
                        var html = data.html;
                        if (html) {
                            
                            var kbpPromoPopover = popover.create($atwlMain.parent(), {
                                name : 'kbpPromoPopover',
                                content : html,
                                position : 'triggerBottom',
                                width : data.width
                            });
                            kbpPromoPopover.show().lock();
                            
                            A.delay(function () {
                                var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                                var hide = !state.mouseOver;
                                if (hide) {
                                    kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                                    popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                                } else {
                                    state.countDown = true;
                                }
                                A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                            }, 10000);
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                A.ajax('/gp/toys/birthday/atwl-dpx.html', {
                    method : 'get',
                    cache : false,
                    params : {
                        isAUI : 1
                    },
                    success : showKbpPromoPopover,
                    error : function () {}
                });
                if (!wireDeclaratives) {
                    
                    A.declarative('atwl-kbp-promo-mouseover', 'mouseleave', function () {
                        var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                        state.mouseOver = false;
                        var hide = state.countDown;
                        if (hide) {
                            var kbpPromoPopover = popover.get('kbpPromoPopover');
                            if (kbpPromoPopover) {
                                kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                                popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                            }
                        }
                        A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                    });
                    
                    A.declarative('atwl-kbp-promo-mouseover', 'mouseenter', function () {
                        var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                        state.mouseOver = true;
                        A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                    });
                    
                    A.on('a:popover:hide:kbpPromoPopover', function () {
                        var kbpPromoPopover = popover.get('kbpPromoPopover');
                        kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                        popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                    });
                }
            }

            setAtwlState({wireDeclaratives : true});
        });
    
    
    
        P.when("A", "a-modal",'ready').execute(function(A, modal){
            var $ = A.$;

            var parseButtonType = function (btnClicked) {
                var btnName = btnClicked.attr("name");
                var btnNameParts = btnName.split('.');
                var re1 = /submit\.add-to-registry\./;
                var re2 = /submit\.add-to-/;
                if (btnName.match(re1)) {
                    return btnNameParts[2];
                } else if (btnName.match(re2)) {
                    var parts = btnNameParts[1].split("-");
                    return parts[2];
                }
                return '';
            };
        
            var parsePostData = function (action, btnType) {
                var form = $('#addToCart');
                var serArr = form.serializeArray();
                var data = {};
                var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                $.each(serArr, function (){
                    data[this.name] = this.value;
                });
                data['itemCount'] = data.quantity;
                data['sid'] = data['session-id'];
                data['cache'] = false;
                data['url'] = wishlistState[action + 'Url'];
    
                if (action === 'add') {
                    data.type = btnType;
                    data.caller = "aui";
                    data.sourceVendorId = "website.wishlist.detail.add";
                    data.streaming = wishlistState.streaming;
                } else if (action === 'create') {
                    data['create_sid'] = data.sid;
                    data['create_type'] = btnType;
                    data['create_sourceVendorId'] = "wishlist.createflow.assign";
                    data['create_nextAction'] = "add";
                    data['create_includeEmptyList'] = 1;
                    data['create_isFirst'] = wishlistState.isFirstCreate ? 1 : 0;
                    data.caller = "aui";
                }
                return data;
            };
        
            var forceFormSubmit = function (btnClicked) {     
                var btnName = btnClicked.attr('name');
                var form = btnClicked.parents('form');    
                var inputName = $('<input type="hidden" />').attr("name", btnName).val('1');
                form.append($(inputName));
                form.submit();
            };
        	
            var redirectToHUCPage = function() {
                var btnClicked = $('#add-wishlist-declarative').closest('.a-button').find('input');
                forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
            }
            
            if (!A.capabilities.touch) {
                $('#add-to-wishlist-button-submit').unbind("click").bind("click", function(event) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    
                    if ($(this).css("cursor") == "not-allowed") {
                        return false;
                    }
                    
                    var currentAction = "";
                    var dpState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    var popCommand = $("[name='wlPopCommand']").val();

                    if (popCommand !== "") {
                        
                        var popCommandParts = popCommand.split('_');
                        currentType = popCommandParts[2];
                        
                        
                        if ((currentType !== 'wishlist' && currentType !== 'giftlist' && currentType !== 'supplylist') ||
                               $('html').hasClass('a-lt-ie9'))  {
                            redirectToHUCPage();
                            return;
                        }
                        currentAction = (popCommandParts[1] === 'new') ? "create" : (popCommandParts[1] === 'default' && dpState.isFirstCreate) ? "create" : "add";
                    } else {
                        currentType = "wishlist";
                        currentAction =  dpState.isFirstCreate ? "create" : "add";
                        
                        if (currentAction === "add" && $('html').hasClass('a-lt-ie9')) {
                            redirectToHUCPage();
                            return;
                        }
                    }
                    A.state("wishlistDPState", {action: currentAction, type: currentType});
                    $('#add-wishlist-declarative').trigger("click");
                });
            }
        
            var clearPopCommandFields = function() {
                var popCommandFields = ['wlPopCommand'];
                for (var i = 0; i < popCommandFields.length; i++) {
                    var fieldName = popCommandFields[i];
                    var field = $('[name^="' + fieldName + '"]');
                    if (field && field.length) {
                        field.val("");
                    }
                }
            }
        
            var eventAlreadyBound = A.state('wishlistDPState').eventsBound;
        
            if (!eventAlreadyBound) {        
                A.on('a:popover:show:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    var popover = event.popover;
                    var $popover = popover.$popover;
                    var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    var action = wishlistState.action;
                    
                    $popover.addClass('pop-huc-' + action);
                    var btnClicked = popover.$trigger.closest('.a-button').find('input');
                    var btnType = wishlistState.type;
                    
                    btnClicked.closest('.a-button-selected').removeClass('a-button-selected');
                    
                    
                    var declarativeData = parsePostData(action, btnType);
                    var url = declarativeData.url;
                    var streaming = declarativeData.streaming;
                    var scope = "ajax_" + streaming;
                    var t0 = new Date();
                    if (window.ue) {
                        uet('tc', scope);
                    }
                    
                    var closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit = function() {
                        popover.hide();
                        forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
                    };
                    
                    var emitRawUEData = function() {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            uet("be", scope);
                            uex("ld", scope);
                        }
                    };
                    
                    var emitCF = function() {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            uet("cf", scope);
                        }
                    }
                    
                    var emitHitData = function(requestId, time, ctb) {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            ues("id", scope, requestId);
                            ues("t0", scope, time);
                            ues("ctb", scope, ctb);
                        }
                    };
                    
                    if (action === "create" || !streaming) {
                        A.ajax(url, {
                            method: 'post',
                            params: declarativeData,
                            success: function(response) {
                                if (response && response.html) {
                                    emitHitData(response.requestId, t0, "1"); 
                                    if (response.status && response.status === 'no-asins') {
                                        
                                        closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                    } else {
                                        
                                        popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').addClass('a-hidden');
                                        if (action === 'add') {
                                            popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                        } else {
                                            popover.$popover.find('#WLNEW_main').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                            
                                            var wlDropDownState = A.state('atwl');
                                            if (wlDropDownState && wlDropDownState.resetDropDownHtml ) {
                                                wlDropDownState.resetDropDownHtml();
                                            }
                                        }
                                        
                                        popover.updatePosition();
                                    }
                                    emitRawUEData(); 
                                } else {
                                    if (action === 'create') {
                                        forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
                                    }
                                    popover.hide();
                                }
                            },
                            error: closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit
                        });
                    } else {
 
                        var request = new XMLHttpRequest();
                        request.open("GET", declarativeData.url + "&" + A.$.param(declarativeData), true);
                        request.send(null);
                        var lastChunkIndex = 0;
                        
                        request.ontimeout = closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit;
                        
                        request.onerror = closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit;

                        request.onreadystatechange = function() {
                            try {
                                if (request.readyState > 2 && (typeof(request.status) != "unknown" && request.status === 200)
                                    && (typeof(request.response) !== 'undefined' || (typeof(request.responseText) != 'unknown' && typeof(request.responseText) !== 'undefined'))) {
                                    var jsons = [];
                                    if (typeof(request.response) !== 'undefined' && request.response !== null) {
                                        jsons = request.response.split(",,,");
                                    } else if (typeof(request.responseText) != 'unknown' && typeof(request.responseText) !== 'undefined' && request.responseText !== null) {
                                        jsons = request.responseText.split(",,,");
                                    }
                                    for (var index = lastChunkIndex; index < jsons.length ; index++) {
                                        var json = jsons[index];
                                        try {
                                            var response = A.parseJSON(json);
                                        } catch (e) {
                                            lastChunkIndex = index;
                                            break;
                                        }
                                        if (index === 0 && response && response.name === "skeleton") {
                                            
                                            if (response && response.html) {
                                                emitHitData(response.requestId, new Date(), "1");
                                                if (response.status && response.status === 'no-asins') {
                                                    
                                                    closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                                } else {
                                                    
                                                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').addClass('a-hidden');
                                                    popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                                }
                                            } 
                                        } else if(response && response.name && response.html && response.name !== "js") {
                                          popover.$popover.find('#' + response.name).html(response.html);
                                          
                                          if (index === 1) {
                                              emitCF();
                                          }                                      
                                        } else if(response && response.html){
                                          popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').append(response.html);
                                        }
                                        popover.updatePosition();
                                    }
                                    if (request.readyState === 4) {
                                        emitRawUEData();
                                    }
                                } else if(typeof(request.status) != 'unknown' && request.status !== 200) {
                                    closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                }
                            } catch (e) {
                                closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                            }
                        };
                    }
                    clearPopCommandFields();
                });
                
                A.on('a:popover:beforeShow:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    var popover = event.popover;
                    var $popover = popover.$popover;
                    var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    
                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').css({'margin': '10% 40%'});
                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').removeClass('a-hidden');
                    
                    popover.$popover.find('.wlAddCreatePop').html('').addClass('a-hidden');
                    
                    
                    var action = wishlistState.action;
                    popover.update({"width": wishlistState[action + 'Width'], "header": wishlistState[action + 'Header'], "height": wishlistState[action + 'Height']});
                    popover.updatePosition();
                });
                
                A.on('a:popover:hide:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    $('.a-modal-scroller').css({"visibility":"hidden"});            
                });
                
                A.state("wishlistDPState", {eventsBound: true});
            }
            clearPopCommandFields();
        });
        </script>
       </form>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="atfMarker" id="atfMarker_feature_div">
      <script type="text/javascript">
       setCSMReq('af');if(typeof addlongPoleTag === 'function'){ addlongPoleTag('af','desktop-html-atf-marker');};
      </script>
     </div>

  }

       </div>

      <script type="text/javascript">
       (function(){
	var insertCenterColStyle = function(width) {
		var totalWidth = width + 40,
		    style = document.createElement('style'),
		    head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0],
		    css = '#centerCol.centerColumn{margin-left:' + totalWidth + 'px !important;}';
		
		style.type = 'text/css';
		if(style.styleSheet) {
			style.styleSheet.cssText = css;
		} else {
			style.appendChild(document.createTextNode(css));
		}
		head.appendChild(style);
	};

	var maintainWidth = function() {
		var w = window.innerWidth || document.body.offsetWidth;
		if(w < 1150) {	
			var containerWidth = 200,
			    containerHeight = containerWidth / 0.75,
			    leftCol = document.getElementById("leftCol"),
			    imageBlock = document.getElementById("imageBlock"),
			    imageBlockContainer = document.getElementById("imageBlockContainer"),
			    frontImage = document.getElementById("imgBlkFront"),
			    imageCanvas = document.getElementById("img-canvas");
			        
	        leftCol.style.width = containerWidth + "px";
			imageBlock.style.width = containerWidth + "px";
			imageBlock.style.height = containerHeight + 40 + "px";
			imageBlockContainer.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
	        imageCanvas.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
	        frontImage.style.overflow = "hidden";
	    }
	    insertCenterColStyle(containerWidth);   
	};
	maintainWidth();
})();

P.when('A').register("ImageBlockATF", function(A){
	var audibleData = {};
	if(false){
		audibleData = {
			'audioSampleSrc' : "",
		    'flashPlayerUrl' : ""
		}
	}
	var data = {
		
	    'litbData' : {
	    	'hasLitb' : true,
	    	'litbReftag' : "sib_dp_pt"
	    },
	    'audibleData' : audibleData,
	    'windowWidthThreshold' : 1150,
	    'configWidths' : [200, 260],
	    'holderRatio' : 0.75,
	    'containerMargin' : 15,
	    'flipLinkMinHeight' : 25,
	    'frontImageWidth' : 260,
	    'frontImageHeight' : 333,
	    'frontImageAspectRatio' : 0.7807807807807807,
	    'imageGalleryData' : [{"mainUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51Gc6qHDWAL.jpg","dimensions":[390,500],"thumbUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51Gc6qHDWAL._SX75_CR,0,0,75,75_.jpg"}],
	    'centerColMargin' : 40
	};
	return data;
});
      </script>

     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="averageCustomerReviews" id="averageCustomerReviews_feature_div">
      <div class="a-spacing-small" data-asin="0321696727" data-ref="dp_top_cm_cr_acr_pop_" id="averageCustomerReviews">
       <span class="reviewCountTextLinkedHistogram" title="4.2 out of 5 stars">
        <a class="a-popover-trigger a-declarative" href="javascript:void(0)">
         <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-4">
         </i>
         <i class="a-icon a-icon-popover">
         </i>
        </a>
        <span class="a-letter-space">
        </span>
       </span>
       <a href="/Chemistry-Central-Science-12th-Edition/product-reviews/0321696727/ref=dp_top_cm_cr_acr_txt?showViewpoints=1">
        48 customer reviews
       </a>
      </div>
      <script type="text/javascript">
       amznJQ.onCompletion("amznJQ.criticalFeature", function() {
amznJQ.available("popover", function() {
    var acr = jQuery("#averageCustomerReviews");
    var dest = "/gp/customer-reviews/common/du/displayHistoPopAjax.html?ref=" + acr.attr("data-ref") + 
               "&link=1&seeall=1&ASIN=" + acr.attr("data-asin");
    acr.find(".reviewCountTextLinkedHistogram").amazonPopoverTrigger({
        destination: dest,
        group: "reviewsPopover",
        hoverHideDelay:300,
        location:"bottom",
        locationAlign:"left",
        locationOffset:[-20,-2],
        paddingLeft: 15,
        paddingBottom: 5,
        paddingRight: 15,
        showOnHover:true,
        showCloseButton: true,
        width: null,
        onShow: function(popover) { 
            jQuery(document).click(); 
        }
    })
});
});
      </script>
     </div>
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="bylineBullets" id="bylineBullets_feature_div">
      <div class="a-section">
       <span class="a-color-secondary">
        ISBN-13:
       </span>
       <span>
        978-0321696724
       </span>
       <i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator">
       </i>
       <span class="a-color-secondary">
        ISBN-10:
       </span>
       <span>
        0321696727
       </span>
       <i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator">

    height:0px;

      </script>
      <script type="text/javascript">
       P.register("DynamicIframe", function(){

function DynamicIframe(options) {
  
  var nTries = 0,
      MAX_TRIES = 20,
      iframeId = options.iframeId,
      encodedIframeContent = options.encodedIframeContent,
      iframeWrapperId = options.iframeWrapperId,
      initialResizeCallback = options.initialResizeCallback,
      iframeCSSId = "dynamic_iframe_CSS";
      iframeOverriddenCSSId = options.overriddenCSSId;
    
  this.createIframe = function() {
    var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
    iframe.id = iframeId;
    iframe.className = "ap_never_hide";
    iframe.width = "100%";
    iframe.scrolling = "no";
    iframe.frameBorder = "0";
    onloadFn = this.iframeload;
    
    if ( iframe.addEventListener )
      iframe.addEventListener("load", onloadFn, false);
    else if ( iframe.attachEvent )
      iframe.attachEvent("onload", onloadFn);
    else iframe.onload = onloadFn;
    
    var wrapper = document.getElementById(iframeWrapperId);
    wrapper.innerHTML = '';
    iframe = wrapper.appendChild(iframe);
    
    var overriddenCSS = "";
    if (document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId)) {
    	overriddenCSS = document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId).innerHTML;
    }
    
    var doc = iframe.contentWindow.document || iframe.contentDocument;
    if (doc && doc.open) {
      doc.open();

      doc.writeln('<html><body><style class="text/css">' + document.getElementById(iframeCSSId).innerHTML + overriddenCSS + '</style><div id="iframeContent">' + 
              '' + decodeURIComponent(encodedIframeContent) + '</'+'div>'+'</'+'body></html>');
      doc.close();
    }
  }
  
  this.iframeload = function () {
    var iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
    iframe.style.display = '';
    setTimeout(function () {
      setIframeHeight(initialResizeCallback);
    }, 20); 
  }
  
  function getDocHeight(doc) {
    var contentDiv = doc.getElementById("iframeContent");
    
    return Math.max(
    	contentDiv.scrollHeight,
    	contentDiv.offsetHeight,
    	contentDiv.clientHeight
    );
  }
  
  function setIframeHeight(resizeCallback) {
    var iframeDoc, iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
    iframeDoc = iframe.contentWindow.document || iframe.contentDocument;
    if (iframeDoc) {
      var h = getDocHeight(iframeDoc);
      if (h && h != 0) {
        iframe.style.height = parseInt(h) + 'px';
        if(typeof resizeCallback == "function") {
          resizeCallback(iframeId);	
        }
      } else if (nTries < MAX_TRIES) {
        nTries++;
        setTimeout(function () {
            setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);
        }, 50);
      }
    }
  }
  
  this.resizeIframe = function(resizeCallback) {
    nTries = 0;
	setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);
  }
}

return DynamicIframe;
});
      </script>
     </div>

      <script type="text/javascript">
       P.when('DynamicIframe').execute(function(DynamicIframe){
	var BookDescriptionIframe = null,
	    bookDescEncodedData = "%3CP%20style%3D%22MARGIN%3A%200px%22%3ETrusted%2C%20innovative%2C%20and%20calibrated%2C%20%3CI%3E%20%3CB%3EChemistry%3A%20The%20Central%20Scienc%3C%2FB%3E%20%3CB%3Ee%3C%2FB%3E%20%3C%2FI%3E%20has%20helped%20millions%20of%20students%20understand%20and%20succeed%20in%20general%20chemistry.%20Its%20unrivaled%20problems%2C%20scientific%20accuracy%2C%20and%20clarity%20are%20maintained%20in%20this%20new%20edition%2C%20which%20is%20the%20book%26rsquo%3Bs%20biggest%20revision%20to%20date.%20In%20the%20%3CB%3ETwelfth%20Edition%2C%3C%2FB%3E%20every%20word%20and%20piece%20of%20art%20has%20been%20studied%20for%20effectiveness.%20Based%20on%20feedback%20from%20students%20like%20you%2C%20this%20revision%20reflects%20the%20unparalleled%20expertise%20of%20its%20author%20team%3B%20each%20chapter%20has%20been%20updated%20and%20streamlined%20to%20remove%20any%20content%20not%20proven%20to%20increase%20student%20comprehension.%20Joined%20in%20this%20edition%20by%20new%20co-author%20Patrick%20Woodward%2C%20the%20book%26rsquo%3Bs%20solid%20authorship%20gains%20a%20fresh%2C%20new%20perspective%20yet%20maintains%20its%20unified%2C%20consistent%20voice.%26nbsp%3B%20%3C%2FP%3E%20%20%3CP%20style%3D%22MARGIN%3A%200px%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2FP%3E%20%20%3CP%20style%3D%22MARGIN%3A%200px%22%3E%20%3CB%3ENote%3A%26nbsp%3B%3C%2FB%3E%20%3CB%3EThis%20is%20a%20standalone%20book%2C%20if%20you%20want%20the%20book%2Faccess%20code%20order%20the%20ISBN%20below%3A%3C%2FB%3E%20%3C%2FP%3E%20%20%3CP%20style%3D%22MARGIN%3A%200px%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2FP%3E%20%20%3CP%20style%3D%22MARGIN%3A%200px%22%3E%20%3C%2FP%3E%20%3CB%3E%20%20%3CP%20style%3D%22MARGIN%3A%200px%22%3E0321741056%20%2F%209780321741059%20Chemistry%3A%20The%20Central%20Science%20with%20MasteringChemistry%20%3C%2FP%3E%20%20%3CP%20style%3D%22MARGIN%3A%200px%22%3E%20%3C%2FB%3EPackage%20consists%20of%20%3C%2FP%3E%20%20%3CP%20style%3D%22MARGIN%3A%200px%22%3E0321696727%20%2F%209780321696724%20Chemistry%3A%20The%20Central%20%3C%2FP%3E%20%20%3CP%20style%3D%22MARGIN%3A%200px%22%3E0321705106%20%2F%209780321705105%20MasteringChemistry%20with%20Pearson%20eText%20Student%20Access%20Code%20Card%20for%20Chemistry%3A%20The%20Central%20Science%20%3C%2FP%3E",
	    bookDescriptionAvailableHeight,
	    minBookDescriptionInitialHeight = 112,
	    options = {};
	    
    function resizeCallback() {
       	var bdOffsetTop = document.getElementById("bookDescription_feature_div").offsetTop;
   		var imageBlockOffsetTop = document.getElementById("booksImageBlock_feature_div").offsetTop;
   		var imageBlockHeight = document.getElementById("booksImageBlock_feature_div").offsetHeight;
   		bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = imageBlockOffsetTop + imageBlockHeight -bdOffsetTop - 30;
   		if(bookDescriptionAvailableHeight < minBookDescriptionInitialHeight) {
   	        bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = minBookDescriptionInitialHeight;
   		}
    		
    	var psTotalHeight = document.getElementById("postBodyPS").offsetHeight;

    	if(psTotalHeight > bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 30){
    		if(document.getElementById("bdSeeLessPrompt").style.display == "none"){
    	    	document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 'px';
    	    	document.getElementById("psPlaceHolder").style.display ="block";
    	    	document.getElementById("bdSeeAllPrompt").style.display ="block";
    		}
    		else{
    			document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';
    		}
        }
        else{
        	document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';
        	document.getElementById("psPlaceHolder").style.display ="none";
        	document.getElementById("bdSeeAllPrompt").style.display ="block";
	    	document.getElementById("bdSeeLessPrompt").style.display ="none";
	    	document.getElementById("bdExpanderIcon").className = document.getElementById("bdExpanderIcon").className.replace("rotate","");
        }
    }
	    
	options.iframeId = "bookDesc_iframe";
	options.iframeWrapperId = "bookDesc_iframe_wrapper";
	options.overriddenCSSId = "bookDesc_override_CSS";
	options.encodedIframeContent = bookDescEncodedData;
	options.initialResizeCallback = resizeCallback;
	
	BookDescriptionIframe = new DynamicIframe(options);
	BookDescriptionIframe.createIframe();
	    
	if ((typeof BookDescriptionIframe != 'undefined') && (BookDescriptionIframe instanceof DynamicIframe)) {
	  P.when('jQuery').execute(function($) {
	    $(window).resize(function() {
	        BookDescriptionIframe.resizeIframe(resizeCallback);
	    });
	    $(window).bind('imageResize', function() {
	    	BookDescriptionIframe.resizeIframe(resizeCallback);
	    });
	  });
	}
});
      </script>

    <script>
     amznJQ.available('jQuery', function() {
    window.sitbWeblab = '';
    if (typeof(Vellum) == 'undefined') {
        Vellum = {
            js: "http://z-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/digital/sitb/reader/v4/201403261048/en_US/sitb-library-js._V339820805_.js",
            sj: "/gp/search-inside/js?locale=en_US&version=201403261048",
            css: "http://z-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/digital/sitb/reader/v4/201403261048/en_US/sitb-library-css._V339820804_.css",
            pl: function(){Vellum.lj(Vellum.js, Vellum.sj, Vellum.css)},
            lj: function(u,u2,uc){
                if (window.vellumLjDone) return;
                window.vellumLjDone = true;
                var d = document;
                var s = d.createElement('link');
                s.type = 'text/css';
                s.rel = 'stylesheet';
                s.href = uc;
                d.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(s);
                s = d.createElement('script');
                s.type = 'text/javascript';
                s.src = u2;
                d.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(s);
            },
            lj2: function(u) {
                var d = document;
                var s = d.createElement('script');
                s.type = 'text/javascript';
                s.src = u;
                d.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(s);
            },
            go: function(){
                sitbLodStart = new Date().getTime();
                jQuery('body').css('overflow', 'hidden');
                var jqw = jQuery(window);
                var h = jqw.height();
                var w = jqw.width();
                var st = jqw.scrollTop();

                jQuery('#vellumShade').css({ 'top' : st, 'height' : h, 'width' : w }).show();

                var vli = jQuery('#vellumLdgIco');
                var nl = (w/2)-(vli.width()/2);
                var nt = st + (h/2) - (vli.height()/2);
                vli.css({"left" : nl, "top" : nt }).show();
                setTimeout("Vellum.x()", 20000);
                Vellum.pl();
            },
            x: function(){
                jQuery('#vellumMsgTxt').html("An error occurred while trying to show this book.");
                jQuery('#vellumMsgHdr').html("Server Timeout");
                jQuery('#vellumMsg').show();
                var reftagImage = new Image();
                reftagImage.src = '/gp/search-inside/reftag/ref=rdr_bar_jsto';
            },
            h: function() {
                jQuery('#vellumMsg').hide();
                jQuery('#vellumShade').hide();
                jQuery('#vellumLdgIco').hide();
                jQuery("body").css('overflow', 'auto');
            },
            cf: function(a) {
                return function() {v.mt = a; v.rg = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments); v.go()}
            },
            c: function(a) {
                var v = Vellum;
                v.mt = 'c'; v.rg = [a]; v.pl();
            }
        }
    
        var f = "opqr".split('');
        for (var i in f) {
            var v = Vellum;
            v[f[i]] = v.cf(f[i]);
        }
        sitbAsin = '0321696727';
        SitbReader = {
            LightboxActions: {
                openReader: function(r) {Vellum.o('0321696727', r); return false},
                openReaderToRandomPage: function(r) {Vellum.r('0321696727', r); return false},
                openReaderToSearchResults: function(q,r) {Vellum.q('0321696727',q,r); return false},
                openReaderToPage: function(p,t,r) {Vellum.p('0321696727',p,t,r); return false}
            }
        }
    }

    amznJQ.onCompletion('amznJQ.criticalFeature', function() { Vellum.c('0321696727') } );
  });
    </script>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            function acrPopoverHover(e, h) {
        if(h) window.acrAsinHover = e;
        else if(window.acrAsinHover == e) window.acrAsinHover = null;
      }

  amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() {
    (function($) {
      if($.fn.acrPopover) return;
      var popoverConfig = {
        showOnHover:true,
        showCloseButton: true,
        width: null,
        location:'bottom',
        locationAlign:'left',
        locationOffset:[-20,0],
        paddingLeft: 15,
        paddingBottom: 5,
        paddingRight: 15,
        group: 'reviewsPopover',
        clone:false,
        hoverHideDelay:300
      };

      $.fn.acrPopover = function() {
          return this.each(function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            if(!$this.data('init') && typeof $this.amazonPopoverTrigger === 'function') {
              $this.data('init', 1);
              var getargs = $this.attr('getargs');
              var ajaxURL = '/gp/customer-reviews/common/du/displayHistoPopAjax.html?' +
                         '&ASIN=' + $this.attr('name') +
                         '&link=1' +
                         '&seeall=1' +
                         '&ref=' + $this.attr('ref') +
                         ((typeof getargs != 'undefined') ? ('&getargs=' + getargs) : '');
              var myConfig = $.extend(true, { destination: ajaxURL }, popoverConfig);
              $this.amazonPopoverTrigger(myConfig);

              var w = window.acrAsinHover;
              if(w && $(w).parents('.asinReviewsSummary').get(0) == this) {
                $this.trigger('mouseover.amzPopover');
                window.acrAsinHover = null;
              }
            }
        });
      };

      window.reviewHistPopoverConfig = popoverConfig;
      var jqInit = window.jQueryInitHistoPopovers = function(asin) {
        if (typeof $('.acr-popover[name=' + asin + ']').acrPopover === 'function') {
          $('.acr-popover[name=' + asin + ']').acrPopover();
        }
      };
      window.doInit_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onAjaxUpdate_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onCacheUpdate_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onCacheUpdateReselect_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;

      amznJQ.onCompletion('amznJQ.criticalFeature', function() {
          setTimeout(function() { amznJQ.declareAvailable('acrPopover'); }, 10);
      });
    })(jQuery);
  });
  amznJQ.onReady('acrPopover', function() {
    jQuery('.acr-popover,#searchTemplate .asinReviewsSummary').each(function() {
      if (typeof jQuery(this).acrPopover === 'function') {
        jQuery(this).acrPopover();
      }
    });
  });
           </script>
           <span class="crAvgStars" style="white-space:no-wrap;">
            <span class="asinReviewsSummary acr-popover" name="0321696727" ref="dp_db_cm_cr_acr_pop_">

              <span class="swSprite s_star_4_0 " title="4.2 out of 5 stars">

    <div class="bucket" id="productDescription">
     <h2>
      Editorial Reviews
     </h2>
     <div class="content">
      <h3 class="productDescriptionSource">
       About the Author
      </h3>
      <div class="productDescriptionWrapper">
       THEODORE L. BROWN received his Ph.D. from Michigan State University in 1956. Since then, he has been a member of the faculty of the University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign, where he is now Professor of Chemistry, Emeritus. He served as Vice Chancellor for Research, and Dean, The Graduate College, from 1980 to 1986, and as Founding Director of the Arnold and Mabel Beckman Institute for Advanced Science and Technology from 1987 to 1993. Professor Brown has been an Alfred P. Sloan Foundation Research Fellow and has been awarded a Guggenheim Fellowship. In 1972 he was awarded the American Chemical Society Award for Research in Inorganic Chemistry, and received the American Chemical Society Award for Distinguished Service in the Advancement of Inorganic Chemistry in 1993. He has been elected a Fellow of both the American Association for the Advancement of Science and the American Academy of Arts and Sciences.
       <br/>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       H. EUGENE LEMAY, JR., received his B.S. degree in Chemistry from Pacific Lutheran University
       <br/>
       (Washington) and his Ph.D. in Chemistry in 1966 from the University of Illinois (Urbana). He then joined the faculty of the University of Nevada, Reno, where he is currently Professor of Chemistry, Emeritus. He has enjoyed Visiting Professorships at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, at the University College of Wales in Great Britain, and at the University of California, Los Angeles. Professor LeMay is a popular and effective teacher, who has taught thousands of students during more than 35 years of university teaching. Known for the clarity of his lectures and his sense of humor, he has received several teaching awards, including the University Distinguished Teacher of the Year Award (1991) and the first Regentsâ€™ Teaching Award given by the State of Nevada Board of Regents (1997).
       <br/>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       BRUCE E. BURSTEN received his Ph.D. in Chemistry from the University of Wisconsin in 1978. After two years as a National Science Foundation Postdoctoral Fellow at Texas A&amp;M University, he joined the faculty of The Ohio State University, where he rose to the rank of Distinguished University Professor. In 2005, he moved to his present position at the University of Tennessee, Knoxville as Distinguished Professor of Chemistry and Dean of the College of Arts and Sciences. Professor Bursten has been a Camille and Henry Dreyfus Foundation Teacher-Scholar and an Alfred P. Sloan Foundation Research Fellow, and he has been elected a Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science. At Ohio State he has received the University Distinguished Teaching Award in 1982 and 1996, the Arts and Sciences Student Council Outstanding Teaching Award in 1984, and the University Distinguished Scholar Award in 1990. He received the Spiers Memorial Prize and Medal of the Royal Society of Chemistry in 2003, and the Morley Medal of the Cleveland Section of the American Chemical Society in 2005. He was elected President of the American Chemical Society for 2008. In addition to his teaching and service activities, Professor Bursten's research program focuses on compounds of the transition-metal and actinide elements.
       <br/>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       CATHERINE J. MURPHY received two B.S. degrees, one in Chemistry and one in Biochemistry, from the
       <br/>
       University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign, in 1986. She received her Ph.D. in Chemistry from the University of Wisconsin in 1990. She was a National Science Foundation and National Institutes of Health Postdoctoral Fellow at the California Institute of Technology from 1990 to 1993. In 1993, she joined the faculty of the University of South Carolina, Columbia, where she is currently the Guy F. Lipscomb Professor of Chemistry. Professor Murphy has been honored for both research and teaching as a Camille Dreyfus Teacher-Scholar, an Alfred P. Sloan Foundation Research Fellow, a Cottrell Scholar of the Research Corporation, a National Science Foundation CAREER Award winner and a subsequent NSF Award for Special Creativity. She has also received a USC Mortar Board Excellence in Teaching Award, the USC Golden Key Faculty Award for Creative Integration of Research and Undergraduate
       <br/>
       Teaching, the USC Michael J. Mungo Undergraduate Teaching Award, and the USC Outstanding Undergraduate Research Mentor Award. Since 2006, Professor Murphy has served as a Senior Editor to the Journal of Physical Chemistry. Professor Murphyâ€™s research program focuses on the synthesis and optical properties of inorganic nanomaterials, and on the local structure and dynamics of the DNA double helix.
       <br/>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       PATRICK M. WOODWARD received B.S. degrees in both Chemistry and Engineering from Idaho State University in 1991. He received a M.S. degree in Materials Science and a Ph.D. in Chemistry from Oregon State University in 1996. He spent two years as a postdoctoral researcher in the Department of Physics at Brookhaven National Laboratory. In 1998, he joined the faculty of the Chemistry Department at The Ohio State University where he currently holds the rank of Associate Professor. He has enjoyed visiting professorships at the University of Bordeaux, in France, and the University of Sydney, in Australia. Professor Woodward has been an Alfred P. Sloan Foundation Research Fellow and a National Science Foundation CAREER Award winner. He currently serves as an Associate Editor to the Journal of Solid State Chemistry and as the director of the Ohio REEL program, an NSF funded center that works to bring authentic research experiments into the laboratories of 1st and 2nd year chemistry classes in 15 colleges and universities across the state of Ohio. Professor Woodwardâ€™s research program focuses on understanding the links between bonding, structure and properties of solid state inorganic functional materials.
       <br/>
       <div class="emptyClear">
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

            <div class="a-fixed-left-grid-col a-col-right" style="padding-left:3%;*width:96.6%;float:left;">

       <div class="a-section" id="revMHLContainerChild">
        <div class="a-row">
         <div class="a-column a-span11" id="revMH">
          <h3 class="a-spacing-small">
           Most Helpful Customer Reviews
          </h3>
          <div class="a-section" id="revMHRL">
           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R370L5JN1WJREL">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              69 of 72 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R370L5JN1WJREL/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0321696727&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="5.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R370L5JN1WJREL/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0321696727&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                IF YOU NEED THE 12 EDITION BUY THE 11TH!!!!
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/A37KJFB80B19YR/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                Aaron
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on February 22, 2012
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R370L5JN1WJREL">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Hardcover
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              I transferred schools and I needed Chemistry: The Central Science for Chem II.  The class listed that I needed the 12th edition but they also gave us Mastering Chemistry for free so I figured would just use the E-Book.  It turned out to be a pain so about five weeks into the semester I decided I needed a hard copy of the book and decided to check the difference between editions.  These are literally the same book with exception to Ch. 22 &amp; 23 in 11E and Ch. 23 in the 12E.  Most of Ch.23 in 12E is Ch. 23 with parts of Ch. 22 in 11E, you just have to know where you are supposed to be.  Also Ch.25 in 11E is Ch.24 in 12E.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              Even all of the end of chapter exercises are the same in 11E as 12E just numbered differently and some in different order, but all within the same section.  There are some that vary slightly, usually just values, but I'd say 97% are the same.  Not all of the sample questions are identical either throughout the chapter but most are.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              This is a great chemistry book, it is very easy to read and understand and if you put in the work you will see results.  Buy the Student's Guide and Solutions To Exercises (all exercises) and you will have no problems with this course.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              LASTLY: BUY 11e OVER 12e!!!!!! I paid just under $40 TOTAL (including shipping) for the 11e text, Student's Guide, and Solutions To Exercises (all exercises).  These books would run me almost $500 at the university bookstore and probably $300 by looking around online.
             </div>
            </div>
            <a class="a-link-normal comment-link" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R370L5JN1WJREL/ref=cm_cr_dp_cmt?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0321696727&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books#wasThisHelpful" title="5">
             5 Comments
            </a>

           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R3Q0M4SVDYE2GO">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              28 of 36 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R3Q0M4SVDYE2GO/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0321696727&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="4.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-4">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R3Q0M4SVDYE2GO/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0321696727&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                Good freshman chemistry book for non-majors
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/A2X4PBSVF3CGSK/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                SeekingTraveler
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="cr-popup" data-cr-popup='{"width":340,"title":"AmazonHelp","height":340}' style="display:inline;">
               <span class="a-size-micro">
                <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_bdg_help?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=14279681&amp;pop-up=1#vn">
                 <span class="a-color-link c7yBadgeAUI c7yTopDownDashedStrike a-text-bold">
                  VINE VOICE
                 </span>
                </a>
               </span>
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on May 20, 2012
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R3Q0M4SVDYE2GO">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Hardcover
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              <span class="MHRHead">
               I am ambivalent about Chemistry - The Central Science (or should I say, ambi-valent). It is a pretty good choice for a general (freshman) chemistry course; but chemistry majors should have a course that challenges the student with a faster pace, greater depth, and more math. In terms of content and depth, Chemistry - The Central Science is nearly identical to
               <a class="a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/Chemistry-Raymond-Chang/dp/0077274318/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk">
                Chemistry
               </a>
               by Raymond Chang. I prefer the Chang book for its clear and concise prose. Overall, I would say that
               <a class="a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/Principles-Modern-Chemistry-David-Oxtoby/dp/0840049315/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk">
                Principles of Modern Chemistry
               </a>
               by Oxtoby is the best general chemistry textbook for chemistry majors.
               <br/>
               <br/>
               This textbook is very good at what it teaches: every basic chemistry concept seems to have at least some coverage. Chapters are well organized. Information display (use of illustrations, tables, graphs, headers, bolding, and color) demonstrates a professional understanding of learning processes. The prose in the text is simple and easy to understand (I would guess that the book is written at the tenth-grade level). I love the illustrations in this textbook: they are very effective in developing "mental models" of the concepts. I like the thought-provoking questions sprinkled throughout each chapter (with answers provided at the back of the book). I also appreciate the glossary of terms at the end of the book. For what is covered, the textbook does a pretty good job.
               <br/>
               <br/>
               I question the pacing of this book. Perhaps the pacing is based on experiences teaching large populations of non-majors. Chemistry majors could move through this material much faster.
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="columnbalancing-showfullreview" data-columnbalancing-showfullreview="{&quot;rest&quot;:&quot; For example, in my instructor copy of the eleventh edition pH is not covered until page 675 (of 1103).&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;I understand that a freshman chemistry book must set limits on scope and depth, but allowing only two pages on the subject of corrosion is silly. There should be an entire chapter on corrosion. I recommend &lt;a class=\&quot;a-link-normal\&quot; href=\&quot;http://www.amazon.com/Corrosion-Engineering-Mars-Guy-Fontana/dp/0070214638/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk\&quot;&gt;Corrosion Engineering&lt;/a&gt; as a reference. Also, the book should add a section on ion exchangers. The book should at least mention personnel and industrial safety as well as associated OSHA regulations. The chapter on Chemistry and the Environment should explain the impact of sulfur on albedo. &lt;a class=\&quot;a-link-normal\&quot; href=\&quot;http://www.amazon.com/Fundamentals-Air-Pollution-Third-Edition/dp/0121189309/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk\&quot;&gt;Fundamentals of Air Pollution, Third Edition&lt;/a&gt; is a good reference. The chapters on thermodynamics are weak. Refer to &lt;a class=\&quot;a-link-normal\&quot; href=\&quot;http://www.amazon.com/Thermodynamics-Engineering-Approach-Student-Resources/dp/0077366743/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk\&quot;&gt;Thermodynamics: An Engineering Approach with Student Resources DVD&lt;/a&gt; by Cengel and Boles for a much better explanation of the subject matter.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Chemistry - The Central Science does an inadequate job teaching the IUPAC naming conventions for simple ionic and molecular compounds. There needs to be a section or appendix covering naming conventions. The text frequently presents a chemical formula without providing its name. Often, the formula will be presented (without name), then the name will (finally) be presented several pages later. In contrast, &lt;a class=\&quot;a-link-normal\&quot; href=\&quot;http://www.amazon.com/Chemistry-Raymond-Chang/dp/0077274318/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk\&quot;&gt;Chemistry&lt;/a&gt; by Chang has an excellent section on \&quot;Naming Compounds\&quot; in the second chapter. The book &lt;a class=\&quot;a-link-normal\&quot; href=\&quot;http://www.amazon.com/Chemistry-John-A-Olmsted/dp/0471478113/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk\&quot;&gt;Chemistry&lt;/a&gt; by Olmsted &amp; Williams also does a much better job explaining compound naming conventions early in the text. Eventually, Chemistry - The Central Science does a satisfactory job (in the last chapter) explaining the naming conventions of organic compounds; however, the book does a inadequate job explaining carbon numbering in cyclic structures.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;The discussion of chemical bonding in Chemistry - The Central Science is good; but it could (and should) be better. The illustrations are excellent, but the explanations could be improved. I think that Harry B. Gray's book is better (&lt;a class=\&quot;a-link-normal\&quot; href=\&quot;http://www.amazon.com/Chemical-Bonds-Introduction-Molecular-Structure/dp/0805334025/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk\&quot;&gt;Chemical Bonds: An Introduction to Atomic and Molecular Structure&lt;/a&gt; or &lt;a class=\&quot;a-link-normal\&quot; href=\&quot;http://www.amazon.com/Chemical-Structure-Bonding-Roger-Dekock/dp/093570261X/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk\&quot;&gt;Chemical Structure and Bonding&lt;/a&gt;). &lt;a class=\&quot;a-link-normal\&quot; href=\&quot;http://www.amazon.com/Principles-Modern-Chemistry-David-Oxtoby/dp/0840049315/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk\&quot;&gt;Principles of Modern Chemistry&lt;/a&gt; by Oxtoby is also better.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;While Chemistry - The Central Science would be excellent for non-majors, I am disturbed to think that this textbook is being used for chemistry majors. In years past, chemistry majors were taught at a much higher level than this.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;The math required to use this textbook is shockingly low (maybe at the eighth grade level). There is absolutely no use of calculus; the hardest math required involves use of the quadratic equation. By avoiding math, the book is often forced to include long verbal explanations (where a very short mathematical treatment would have been more immediate and effective). On the plus side, the book includes some excellent graphical illustrations to shore up math-light explanations.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Trust me, you need to work the end-of-chapter problems. The publisher has done something very clever to maximize profits: the solution manuals for the problems are sold separately. Not only that! You need to buy TWO solution manuals: One for the \&quot;red\&quot; problems (Solutions to Red Exercises), and one for the \&quot;black\&quot; problems (Solutions to Black Exercises). This has been fairly standard practice for decades, so do not waste too much time cussing and refusing to spend more money. Instead, obtain BOTH solution manuals and work all of the problems.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;If you are using Chemistry: The Central Science (as a student or a teacher), then make sure you check out the publisher's (Prentice Hall) website for additional resources. For example, there is a test question bank for the book, as well as a disc with all the graphics.&quot;}">
               <a class="a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/Chemistry-Central-Science-12th-Edition/product-reviews/0321696727/ref=cm_cr_dp_text?ie=UTF8&amp;showViewpoints=0&amp;sortBy=byRankDescending#R3Q0M4SVDYE2GO">
                <span class="a-letter-space">
                </span>
                Read more â€º
               </a>
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>
            <a class="a-link-normal comment-link" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R3Q0M4SVDYE2GO/ref=cm_cr_dp_cmt?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0321696727&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books#wasThisHelpful" title="8">
             8 Comments
            </a>
            <i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator">
            </i>

           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R170VXR6G6NRVR">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              7 of 9 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R170VXR6G6NRVR/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0321696727&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="5.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R170VXR6G6NRVR/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0321696727&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                Much better than the Silberberg chemistry textbook
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/A1P6HF2JEMZIAH/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                Gordon Aufill
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="cr-popup" data-cr-popup='{"width":340,"title":"AmazonHelp","height":340}' style="display:inline;">
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on December 4, 2011
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R170VXR6G6NRVR">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Hardcover
              <i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator">
              </i>
             </span>
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">
              Verified Purchase
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              I bought this textbook for chemistry II because I was so frustrated with the chemistry textbook by Silberberg. This one is so much easier to understand. It's also less cluttered with stuff on the pages which makes it easier to pay attention while reading. I also found that this textbook also gives more information on the material than Silberberg. The sample problems are much easier to understand and were much more helpful for the tests. Even buying this so late in the semester, it has helped tremendously.
             </div>
            </div>

             1 Comment

             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              1 of 1 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R1BLRM2JQT75LH/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0321696727&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="5.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R1BLRM2JQT75LH/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=0321696727&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                great book!
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/A3DJG5EQI7ICXJ/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                Saibaba Telukunta
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on December 14, 2013
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R1BLRM2JQT75LH">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Hardcover
              <i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator">
              </i>
             </span>
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">
              Verified Purchase
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              I absolutely love this book! Theodore E. Brown makes reading every paragraph very interesting and in a very easy to read format (even for my seventh grader), and is very thorough. Pretty much no background knowledge about chemistry is needed to understand this book. It is also instructive and up to date.
             </div>
