        <script type="text/javascript">
         amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() { 
            P.when("jQuery").execute(function($){
                var dropdownIds = "#add-to-registry-baby-button";
                
                var dropdowns = $(dropdownIds);
                dropdowns.each(function(){
                    var dropdown = jQuery(this);
                    
                    dropdown[0].name = "";
                    if(dropdown.css("cursor") != "not-allowed") {
                        var wlType = dropdown.attr("data-type");
                        var id = dropdown[0].id;
                        
                        var buttonWidth = "232";
                        dropdown.amazonPopoverTrigger({
                            ajaxSlideDuration: 0,
                            align: "left",
                            cacheable: true, 
                            closeEventInclude: "CLICK_OUTSIDE",
                            destination: "/gp/registry/reglist-popover.html?sprited=0&type=" + wlType,
                            group: "addToWishlist",
                            loadingContent: "<div style='padding: 4px 28px;'><img src='" + AmazonPopoverImages.loadingBar + "'/></div>", 
                            location: "bottom",
                            locationElement: "#" + id,
                            locationOffset: [-33,-5],
                            showOnHover: false,
                            skin: "<div id='wishlist-dropdown-content'><div class='ap_content'></div></div>",
                            
                            width: buttonWidth,
                            onFilled: function(popover) { 
                                
                                $(document).click();
                                popover.width(buttonWidth);
                                if (window.wlPop) { 
                                    setTimeout(function() { 
                                        wlPop.onFill(popover);
                                        popover.width(buttonWidth);
                                    }, 0); 
                                } 
                            }
                        });
                    }
                });  
            });
        });
        
        
        function setRegistryId(regStr) {
            var addToCart = jQuery("#addToCart");
            addToCart.find("[name='sourceCustomerOrgListID'],[name='colid'],[name='wlPopCommand']").attr('value', regStr);
            addToCart.find("[name='submit.add-to-registry.wishlist'],[name='submit.add-to-wishlist']").eq(0).click();
            return false;
        }
         
        function clearText(thefield){
            if (thefield.value==thefield.defaultValue)
            thefield.value = "";
        }
    

    
    
        P.when('A', 'a-popover').execute(function (A, popover) {
            var $ = A.$;
            var basePopoverId;
            var ajaxFailCount = 0;
            var wireDeclaratives = A.state('atwl').wireDeclaratives;

            
            var $atwlArrow = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonId);
            $atwlArrow.addClass('a-declarative');
            $atwlArrow.attr('data-action', 'atwl-splitbutton-arrow');
            var $atwlMain = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonSubmitId);
            $atwlMain.addClass('a-declarative');
            $atwlMain.attr('data-action', 'atwl-splitbutton-main');

            
            var CONST = {
                'widthStaticPopovers' : 230,
                'overflowWidth' : 10,
                'noOverflowWidth' : 10,
                'scrollbarWidth' : 17
            };

            
            function makeDropDownArrowInactive() {
                $('#wishListDropDown').removeClass('a-button-selected');
                $('#wishListMainButton').removeClass('a-button-selected');
            }

            
            function setAtwlState(options) {
                A.state('atwl', $.extend(A.state('atwl'), options));
            }
            
            function getDropDownHtml() {
                var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
                return atwlState.dropDownHtml;
            };
            
            function setDropDownHtml(dropDownHtml) {
                setAtwlState({dropDownHtml : dropDownHtml});
            };
            
            function resetDropDownHtml() {
                setDropDownHtml('');
            };
            setAtwlState({resetDropDownHtml : resetDropDownHtml});

            function isListOverflowing() {
                var $popoverWrapper = $('#atwl-dd-ul').parent();
                if ($popoverWrapper && $popoverWrapper.get(0)) {
                    var scrollHeight = $popoverWrapper.get(0).scrollHeight;
                    var height = $popoverWrapper.height();
                    var vertPadding = 2*parseInt($popoverWrapper.css('padding-top'));
                    return (scrollHeight > height + vertPadding);
                }
                return false;
            };

            function ie8NoScroll() {
                if (parseInt($.browser.version, 10) < 9 && document.body && document.body.parentElement) {
                    return !!(document.body.parentElement.scrollLeft || document.body.parentElement.scrollTop);
                }
                return false;
            };

            function adjustPopover($popover) {
                $popover.find('.a-button-close').hide();
                $popover.find('.a-popover-content').css({
                    'margin-right' : '0px'
                });
                $popover.css({
                    'padding' : '0'
                });
                $popover.find('.a-popover-inner').css({
                    'padding' : '0'
                });
                setTimeout(function () {
                    $popover.removeClass('a-arrow-bottom');
                    $('#atwl-rich-content').css({
                        'margin-bottom' :'0px',
                        'width' : 'auto'
                    });
                    
                    if ($.browser.msie) {
                        var $atwlMain = $('#' + A.state('atwl').wishlistButtonSubmitId);
                        var offset = $atwlMain.offset();
                        var height = $atwlMain.height();
                        var left = offset.left;
                        var top = offset.top + height;
                        if (ie8NoScroll()) {
                            left += document.body.parentElement.scrollLeft;
                            top += document.body.parentElement.scrollTop;
                        }
                        var listOverflow = isListOverflowing();
                        if (listOverflow) {
                            left -= 17;
                        }
                        $popover.css({
                            'left' : left + 'px',
                            'top' : top + 'px'
                        });
                    }
                }, 50);
            };

            
            function showStaticPopover(holder) {
                $('#' + holder).children().first().width(CONST.widthStaticPopovers);
                hideStaticPopover();
                var basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                if (!basePopover) {
                    basePopover = popover.create($('#add-to-wishlist-button-group'), {
                        content : $('#' + holder).html(),
                        name : 'atwl',
                        skin : function(content) {return content;},
                        activate : 'onmouseclick',
                        width : CONST.widthStaticPopovers,
                        position : 'triggerBottom'
                    });
                } else {
                    basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                }
                basePopover.update({
                    width : CONST.widthStaticPopovers,
                    content : $('#' + holder).html()
                });
                basePopoverId = basePopover.id;
                basePopover.show().updatePosition();
                var $popover = basePopover.$popover;
                adjustPopover($popover);
            };
            
            function hideStaticPopover() {
                if (basePopoverId) {
                    var basePopover = popover.get(basePopoverId);
                    if (basePopover) {
                        basePopover.hide();
                    }
                }
            };

            function showSpinner() {
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-spinner-holder');
            };

            function hideSpinner() {
                hideStaticPopover();
            };

            function showError() {
                makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                ajaxFailCount++;
                hideSpinner();
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-error-holder');
            };

            function hideError() {
                hideStaticPopover();
                return ajaxFailCount >= A.state('atwl').maxAjaxFailureCount;
            };

            function showUnavail() {
                hideSpinner();
                hideUnavail();
                showStaticPopover('atwl-dd-unavail-holder');
            };

            function hideUnavail() {
                hideStaticPopover();
            };

            
            function parseAjaxResponse(ajaxResponse) {
                makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                hideSpinner();
                try {
                    var response = A.parseJSON(ajaxResponse);
                } catch(e) {
                    showError();
                    return;
                }
                if (typeof response.html !== 'undefined' && response.css !== 'undefined') {
                    setDropDownHtml(response.html);
                    var dropDownCSS = response.css;
                    $('body').append(dropDownCSS);
                    showDropDown();
                } else {
                    showError();
                }
            };
            
            function adjustDropDownDimensions($popover) {
                var timeout;
                if (ie8NoScroll()) {
                    timeout = 50;
                } else {
                    timeout = 0;
                }
                setTimeout(function () {
                    var $inner = $('#atwl-popover-inner');
                    var innerWidth = $inner.width();
                    var listOverflow = isListOverflowing();
                    if (listOverflow) {
                        innerWidth += CONST.overflowWidth;
                    } else {
                        $('.atwl-dd-list-name').each(function(index) {
                            var $this = $(this);
                            $this.width($this.width() + CONST.noOverflowWidth);
                        });
                    }
                    var defaultList = $popover.find('ul li a.a-active').first();
                    defaultList.css('margin-left', '1px');
                    defaultList.parent().focus();
                    $inner.width(innerWidth);
                }, timeout);
            };
            
            function createDropDown() {
                var atwlPopover = popover.create($('#add-to-wishlist-button-group'), {
                    content : getDropDownHtml(),
                    name : 'atwl',
                    skin : function(content) {return content;},
                    activate : 'onmouseclick',
                    position : 'triggerBottom'
                });
                return atwlPopover;
            };
            
            function updateDropDown(atwlPopover) {
                atwlPopover.update({
                    content : getDropDownHtml(),
                    width : 'auto'
                });
                atwlPopover.show();
                adjustPopover(atwlPopover.$popover);
                adjustDropDownDimensions(atwlPopover.$popover);
            };
            
            function showDropDown() {
                var atwlPopover = popover.get('atwl');
                if (atwlPopover) {
                    if (atwlPopover.isActive()) {
                        atwlPopover.hide();
                        return;
                    } else {
                        
                        popover.remove(atwlPopover);
                    }
                } else {
                    
                    atwlPopover = createDropDown();
                    popover.remove(atwlPopover);
                }
                atwlPopover = createDropDown();
                updateDropDown(atwlPopover);
            };
            
            function setRegistryId(regID, regType) {
                if (typeof regType === 'undefined') {
                    regType = 'wishlist';
                }
                var regStr = 'pop_' + regID + '_' + regType;
                var addToCart = jQuery("#addToCart");
                addToCart.find("[name='sourceCustomerOrgListID'],[name='colid'],[name='wlPopCommand']").attr('value', regStr);
                setAtwlState({'inSubmit' : true});
                addToCart.find("[name='submit.add-to-registry.wishlist'],[name='submit.add-to-wishlist']").eq(0).click();
                return false;
            };
            
            if (!wireDeclaratives) {
                
                A.declarative('atwl-splitbutton-arrow', 'click', function (event) {
                    var $this = event.$target;
                    event.$event.preventDefault();
                    setTimeout(function () {
                        makeDropDownArrowInactive();
                    }, 0);
                    if ($this.css("cursor") == "not-allowed") {
                        return false;
                    }
                    if (hideError()) {
                        showUnavail();
                        return false;
                    }
                    var dropDownHtml = getDropDownHtml();
                    var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
                    if (!dropDownHtml || !dropDownHtml.length) {
                        showSpinner();
                        var data = event.data;
                        var urlParams = {
                            'sortMethod' : atwlState.sortMethod,
                            'type' : 'wishlist'
                        };
                        var url = '/gp/registry/atwl/popover.html?' + $.param(urlParams);
                        var params = {
                            'url' : url,
                            'cache' : false,
                            'success' : parseAjaxResponse,
                            'error' : showError
                        };
                        $.ajax(params);
                    } else {
                        showDropDown();
                    }
                    return false;
                });
                
                A.declarative('atwl-dd', 'click', function (event) {
                    event.$event.preventDefault();
                    var data = event.data;
                    setRegistryId(data.id, data.type);
                    return false;
                });
                
                A.declarative('atwl-kbp-landing', 'click', function (event) {
                    var data = event.data;
                    var asin = jQuery("#addToCart").find('#ASIN').val();
                    var href = data.url;
                    href += '&asin=' + asin;
                    window.open(href);
                    return false;
                });
            }

            var atwlState = A.state('atwl');
            if (atwlState && atwlState.sortMethod === 'kbp') {
                
                A.state('atwl', {
                    kbpPromo : {
                        mouseOver : false,
                        countDown : false
                    }
                });
                
                function showKbpPromoPopover(data) {
                    
                    if (data && data.promoEnabled) {
                        var html = data.html;
                        if (html) {
                            
                            var kbpPromoPopover = popover.create($atwlMain.parent(), {
                                name : 'kbpPromoPopover',
                                content : html,
                                position : 'triggerBottom',
                                width : data.width
                            });
                            kbpPromoPopover.show().lock();
                            
                            A.delay(function () {
                                var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                                var hide = !state.mouseOver;
                                if (hide) {
                                    kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                                    popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                                } else {
                                    state.countDown = true;
                                }
                                A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                            }, 10000);
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                A.ajax('/gp/toys/birthday/atwl-dpx.html', {
                    method : 'get',
                    cache : false,
                    params : {
                        isAUI : 1
                    },
                    success : showKbpPromoPopover,
                    error : function () {}
                });
                if (!wireDeclaratives) {
                    
                    A.declarative('atwl-kbp-promo-mouseover', 'mouseleave', function () {
                        var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                        state.mouseOver = false;
                        var hide = state.countDown;
                        if (hide) {
                            var kbpPromoPopover = popover.get('kbpPromoPopover');
                            if (kbpPromoPopover) {
                                kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                                popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                            }
                        }
                        A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                    });
                    
                    A.declarative('atwl-kbp-promo-mouseover', 'mouseenter', function () {
                        var state = A.state('atwl').kbpPromo;
                        state.mouseOver = true;
                        A.state('atwl', {kbpPromo : state});
                    });
                    
                    A.on('a:popover:hide:kbpPromoPopover', function () {
                        var kbpPromoPopover = popover.get('kbpPromoPopover');
                        kbpPromoPopover.unlock().hide();
                        popover.remove(kbpPromoPopover);
                    });
                }
            }

            setAtwlState({wireDeclaratives : true});
        });
    
    
    
        P.when("A", "a-modal",'ready').execute(function(A, modal){
            var $ = A.$;

            var parseButtonType = function (btnClicked) {
                var btnName = btnClicked.attr("name");
                var btnNameParts = btnName.split('.');
                var re1 = /submit\.add-to-registry\./;
                var re2 = /submit\.add-to-/;
                if (btnName.match(re1)) {
                    return btnNameParts[2];
                } else if (btnName.match(re2)) {
                    var parts = btnNameParts[1].split("-");
                    return parts[2];
                }
                return '';
            };
        
            var parsePostData = function (action, btnType) {
                var form = $('#addToCart');
                var serArr = form.serializeArray();
                var data = {};
                var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                $.each(serArr, function (){
                    data[this.name] = this.value;
                });
                data['itemCount'] = data.quantity;
                data['sid'] = data['session-id'];
                data['cache'] = false;
                data['url'] = wishlistState[action + 'Url'];
    
                if (action === 'add') {
                    data.type = btnType;
                    data.caller = "aui";
                    data.sourceVendorId = "website.wishlist.detail.add";
                    data.streaming = wishlistState.streaming;
                } else if (action === 'create') {
                    data['create_sid'] = data.sid;
                    data['create_type'] = btnType;
                    data['create_sourceVendorId'] = "wishlist.createflow.assign";
                    data['create_nextAction'] = "add";
                    data['create_includeEmptyList'] = 1;
                    data['create_isFirst'] = wishlistState.isFirstCreate ? 1 : 0;
                    data.caller = "aui";
                }
                return data;
            };
        
            var forceFormSubmit = function (btnClicked) {     
                var btnName = btnClicked.attr('name');
                var form = btnClicked.parents('form');    
                var inputName = $('<input type="hidden" />').attr("name", btnName).val('1');
                form.append($(inputName));
                form.submit();
            };
        	
            var redirectToHUCPage = function() {
                var btnClicked = $('#add-wishlist-declarative').closest('.a-button').find('input');
                forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
            }
            
            if (!A.capabilities.touch) {
                $('#add-to-wishlist-button-submit').unbind("click").bind("click", function(event) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    
                    if ($(this).css("cursor") == "not-allowed") {
                        return false;
                    }
                    
                    var currentAction = "";
                    var dpState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    var popCommand = $("[name='wlPopCommand']").val();

                    if (popCommand !== "") {
                        
                        var popCommandParts = popCommand.split('_');
                        currentType = popCommandParts[2];
                        
                        
                        if ((currentType !== 'wishlist' && currentType !== 'giftlist' && currentType !== 'supplylist') ||
                               $('html').hasClass('a-lt-ie9'))  {
                            redirectToHUCPage();
                            return;
                        }
                        currentAction = (popCommandParts[1] === 'new') ? "create" : (popCommandParts[1] === 'default' && dpState.isFirstCreate) ? "create" : "add";
                    } else {
                        currentType = "wishlist";
                        currentAction =  dpState.isFirstCreate ? "create" : "add";
                        
                        if (currentAction === "add" && $('html').hasClass('a-lt-ie9')) {
                            redirectToHUCPage();
                            return;
                        }
                    }
                    A.state("wishlistDPState", {action: currentAction, type: currentType});
                    $('#add-wishlist-declarative').trigger("click");
                });
            }
        
            var clearPopCommandFields = function() {
                var popCommandFields = ['wlPopCommand'];
                for (var i = 0; i < popCommandFields.length; i++) {
                    var fieldName = popCommandFields[i];
                    var field = $('[name^="' + fieldName + '"]');
                    if (field && field.length) {
                        field.val("");
                    }
                }
            }
        
            var eventAlreadyBound = A.state('wishlistDPState').eventsBound;
        
            if (!eventAlreadyBound) {        
                A.on('a:popover:show:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    var popover = event.popover;
                    var $popover = popover.$popover;
                    var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    var action = wishlistState.action;
                    
                    $popover.addClass('pop-huc-' + action);
                    var btnClicked = popover.$trigger.closest('.a-button').find('input');
                    var btnType = wishlistState.type;
                    
                    btnClicked.closest('.a-button-selected').removeClass('a-button-selected');
                    
                    
                    var declarativeData = parsePostData(action, btnType);
                    var url = declarativeData.url;
                    var streaming = declarativeData.streaming;
                    var scope = "ajax_" + streaming;
                    var t0 = new Date();
                    if (window.ue) {
                        uet('tc', scope);
                    }
                    
                    var closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit = function() {
                        popover.hide();
                        forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
                    };
                    
                    var emitRawUEData = function() {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            uet("be", scope);
                            uex("ld", scope);
                        }
                    };
                    
                    var emitCF = function() {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            uet("cf", scope);
                        }
                    }
                    
                    var emitHitData = function(requestId, time, ctb) {
                        if (window.ue) {
                            ues("id", scope, requestId);
                            ues("t0", scope, time);
                            ues("ctb", scope, ctb);
                        }
                    };
                    
                    if (action === "create" || !streaming) {
                        A.ajax(url, {
                            method: 'post',
                            params: declarativeData,
                            success: function(response) {
                                if (response && response.html) {
                                    emitHitData(response.requestId, t0, "1"); 
                                    if (response.status && response.status === 'no-asins') {
                                        
                                        closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                    } else {
                                        
                                        popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').addClass('a-hidden');
                                        if (action === 'add') {
                                            popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                        } else {
                                            popover.$popover.find('#WLNEW_main').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                            
                                            var wlDropDownState = A.state('atwl');
                                            if (wlDropDownState && wlDropDownState.resetDropDownHtml ) {
                                                wlDropDownState.resetDropDownHtml();
                                            }
                                        }
                                        
                                        popover.updatePosition();
                                    }
                                    emitRawUEData(); 
                                } else {
                                    if (action === 'create') {
                                        forceFormSubmit(btnClicked);
                                    }
                                    popover.hide();
                                }
                            },
                            error: closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit
                        });
                    } else {
 
                        var request = new XMLHttpRequest();
                        request.open("GET", declarativeData.url + "&" + A.$.param(declarativeData), true);
                        request.send(null);
                        var lastChunkIndex = 0;
                        
                        request.ontimeout = closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit;
                        
                        request.onerror = closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit;

                        request.onreadystatechange = function() {
                            try {
                                if (request.readyState > 2 && (typeof(request.status) != "unknown" && request.status === 200)
                                    && (typeof(request.response) !== 'undefined' || (typeof(request.responseText) != 'unknown' && typeof(request.responseText) !== 'undefined'))) {
                                    var jsons = [];
                                    if (typeof(request.response) !== 'undefined' && request.response !== null) {
                                        jsons = request.response.split(",,,");
                                    } else if (typeof(request.responseText) != 'unknown' && typeof(request.responseText) !== 'undefined' && request.responseText !== null) {
                                        jsons = request.responseText.split(",,,");
                                    }
                                    for (var index = lastChunkIndex; index < jsons.length ; index++) {
                                        var json = jsons[index];
                                        try {
                                            var response = A.parseJSON(json);
                                        } catch (e) {
                                            lastChunkIndex = index;
                                            break;
                                        }
                                        if (index === 0 && response && response.name === "skeleton") {
                                            
                                            if (response && response.html) {
                                                emitHitData(response.requestId, new Date(), "1");
                                                if (response.status && response.status === 'no-asins') {
                                                    
                                                    closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                                } else {
                                                    
                                                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').addClass('a-hidden');
                                                    popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').html(response.html).removeClass('a-hidden');
                                                }
                                            } 
                                        } else if(response && response.name && response.html && response.name !== "js") {
                                          popover.$popover.find('#' + response.name).html(response.html);
                                          
                                          if (index === 1) {
                                              emitCF();
                                          }                                      
                                        } else if(response && response.html){
                                          popover.$popover.find('#WLHUC_result').append(response.html);
                                        }
                                        popover.updatePosition();
                                    }
                                    if (request.readyState === 4) {
                                        emitRawUEData();
                                    }
                                } else if(typeof(request.status) != 'unknown' && request.status !== 200) {
                                    closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                                }
                            } catch (e) {
                                closePopoverWithForceFormSubmit();
                            }
                        };
                    }
                    clearPopCommandFields();
                });
                
                A.on('a:popover:beforeShow:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    var popover = event.popover;
                    var $popover = popover.$popover;
                    var wishlistState = A.state('wishlistDPState');
                    
                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').css({'margin': '10% 40%'});
                    popover.$popover.find('#popover-spinner').removeClass('a-hidden');
                    
                    popover.$popover.find('.wlAddCreatePop').html('').addClass('a-hidden');
                    
                    
                    var action = wishlistState.action;
                    popover.update({"width": wishlistState[action + 'Width'], "header": wishlistState[action + 'Header'], "height": wishlistState[action + 'Height']});
                    popover.updatePosition();
                });
                
                A.on('a:popover:hide:addCreateToWishlist' , function(event) {
                    $('.a-modal-scroller').css({"visibility":"hidden"});            
                });
                
                A.state("wishlistDPState", {eventsBound: true});
            }
            clearPopCommandFields();
        });
        </script>
       </form>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="atfMarker" id="atfMarker_feature_div">
      <script type="text/javascript">
       setCSMReq('af');if(typeof addlongPoleTag === 'function'){ addlongPoleTag('af','desktop-html-atf-marker');};
      </script>
     </div>

  }

    <div id="leftCol">
     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="booksImageBlock" id="booksImageBlock_feature_div">
      <div class="a-row" id="imageBlockOuter">
       <div id="sitbLogo">
        <img class="a-hidden litb-on-click" id="sitbLogoImg" src="http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/digital/sitb/sticker/sitb-sticker-v3-small._V341765094_.png"/>
       </div>
       <div class="a-row" id="imageBlock" style="height:386.6666666666667px;">
        <div class="a-row a-grid-center maintain-height" id="imageBlockContainer" style="height:346.6666666666667px;">
         <div class="a-column a-span12 a-text-center maintain-height a-span-last" id="main-image-container">
          <div class="maintain-height" id="img-wrapper">
           <div class="maintain-height litb-on-click" id="img-canvas" style="height:346.6666666666667px;">
            <img class="image-stretch-horizontal frontImage" id="imgBlkFront" onload="this.onload='';setCSMReq('af');if(typeof addlongPoleTag === 'function'){ addlongPoleTag('af','desktop-image-atf-marker');};setCSMReq('cf');" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/517JerW0%2B3L._SX258_BO1,204,203,200_.jpg" style="max-width:260px; max-height:341px;"/>

       <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini a-spacing-top-micro" id="imageBlockThumbs">
        <span class="a-declarative" data-a-modal='{"content":"&lt;div id=\"imgGalleryContent\" class=\"a-row\"&gt;\n  &lt;div class=\"a-column a-span8 a-text-center ig-main-image\"&gt;\n    &lt;div class=\"img-wrapper maintain-height\"&gt;\n      &lt;div id=\"igInner\" class=\"maintain-height zoomed-out\" style=\"height:200px;\"&gt;\n        &lt;img id=\"igImage\"&gt;\n        &lt;div class=\"a-popover-loading-wrapper a-text-center loading-bar\"&gt;\n          &lt;div class=\"a-box a-color-base-background a-popover-loading\"&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;\n        &lt;\/div&gt;\n      &lt;\/div&gt;\n    &lt;\/div&gt;\n  &lt;\/div&gt;\n  &lt;div class=\"a-column a-span4 ig-thumbs a-span-last\"&gt;\n  &lt;\/div&gt;\n&lt;\/div&gt;\n\n&lt;script type=\"text/javascript\"&gt;\nP.register(\"ImageGalleryMarkup\");\n&lt;\/script&gt;","header":"Images (2)"}' data-action="a-modal" id="imgThumbs">
         <div class="a-column a-span3 a-spacing-micro imageThumb thumb">
          <img src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/517JerW0%2B3L._SX60_CR,0,0,60,60_.jpg"/>
         </div>
         <div class="a-column a-span3 a-spacing-micro imageThumb thumb">
          <img src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51r2uagNmDL._SX60_CR,0,0,60,60_.jpg"/>

       <script type="text/javascript">
        P.when("A","jQuery").execute(function(A, $) {	
	function getWindowWidth() {
		return window.innerWidth || document.body.offsetWidth;
	}
	function getWindowHeight() {
		return document.documentElement.clientHeight;
	}
	function setGalleryDimensions() {
		var widthRatio = 0.75,
		    heightDiff = 100,
		    $trigger = $("#imgThumbs"),
		    data = $trigger.data("a-modal");
		
		data.width = getWindowWidth() * widthRatio;
		data.height = getWindowHeight() - heightDiff;
		$trigger.data("a-modal", data);
		
	}	
	setGalleryDimensions();
	A.on("resize", setGalleryDimensions);
});
       </script>
       <div class="collections-collect-button">
       </div>
      </div>
      <script type="text/javascript">
       (function(){
	var insertCenterColStyle = function(width) {
		var totalWidth = width + 40,
		    style = document.createElement('style'),
		    head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0],
		    css = '#centerCol.centerColumn{margin-left:' + totalWidth + 'px !important;}';
		
		style.type = 'text/css';
		if(style.styleSheet) {
			style.styleSheet.cssText = css;
		} else {
			style.appendChild(document.createTextNode(css));
		}
		head.appendChild(style);
	};

	var maintainWidth = function() {
		var w = window.innerWidth || document.body.offsetWidth;
		if(w < 1150) {	
			var containerWidth = 200,
			    containerHeight = containerWidth / 0.75,
			    leftCol = document.getElementById("leftCol"),
			    imageBlock = document.getElementById("imageBlock"),
			    imageBlockContainer = document.getElementById("imageBlockContainer"),
			    frontImage = document.getElementById("imgBlkFront"),
			    imageCanvas = document.getElementById("img-canvas");
			        
	        leftCol.style.width = containerWidth + "px";
			imageBlock.style.width = containerWidth + "px";
			imageBlock.style.height = containerHeight + 40 + "px";
			imageBlockContainer.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
	        imageCanvas.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
	        frontImage.style.overflow = "hidden";
	    }
	    insertCenterColStyle(containerWidth);   
	};
	maintainWidth();
})();

P.when('A').register("ImageBlockATF", function(A){
	var audibleData = {};
	if(false){
		audibleData = {
			'audioSampleSrc' : "",
		    'flashPlayerUrl' : ""
		}
	}
	var data = {
		
	    'litbData' : {
	    	'hasLitb' : true,
	    	'litbReftag' : "sib_dp_pt"
	    },
	    'audibleData' : audibleData,
	    'windowWidthThreshold' : 1150,
	    'configWidths' : [200, 260],
	    'holderRatio' : 0.75,
	    'containerMargin' : 15,
	    'flipLinkMinHeight' : 25,
	    'frontImageWidth' : 260,
	    'frontImageHeight' : 341,
	    'frontImageAspectRatio' : 0.7624633431085044,
	    'imageGalleryData' : [{"mainUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/517JerW0%2B3L.jpg","dimensions":[381,500],"thumbUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/517JerW0%2B3L._SX75_CR,0,0,75,75_.jpg"},{"mainUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51r2uagNmDL.jpg","dimensions":[381,500],"thumbUrl":"http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51r2uagNmDL._SX75_CR,0,0,75,75_.jpg"}],
	    'centerColMargin' : 40
	};
	return data;
});
      </script>
     </div>
    </div>

     <div class="feature" data-feature-name="dynamicIframe" id="dynamicIframe_feature_div">
      <script id="dynamic_iframe_CSS" type="text/undefined">
       html {
    font-size: 100%;
}
a:focus {
    outline: thin dotted #333333;
    outline-offset: -2px;
}
a:hover, a:active {
    outline: 0 none;
}
body { 
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
    margin:0;
    
    /* from AUI */
    color: #333333;
    font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
    font-size: 13px;
    line-height: 19px;
}
h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}
h1, h2, h3, h4 {
    font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
    text-rendering: optimizelegibility;
    padding-bottom: 4px;
}
h1:last-child, h2:last-child, h3:last-child, h4:last-child {
    padding-bottom: 0;
}
h1 {
    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: normal;
    line-height: 1.2;
}
h2 {
    font-size: 21px;
    font-weight: normal;
    line-height: 1.3;
}
h3 {
    font-size: 17px;
    font-weight: normal;
    line-height: 1.24;
}
p {
  margin: 0 0 14px;
  padding: 0;
}
p:last-child {
    margin-bottom: 0;
}
p + p {
    margin-top: -4px;
}
b, strong {
    font-weight: bold;
}
i, em {
    font-style: italic;
}
blockquote {
    margin: 13px;
}

      <script type="text/javascript">
       P.register("DynamicIframe", function(){

function DynamicIframe(options) {
  
  var nTries = 0,
      MAX_TRIES = 20,
      iframeId = options.iframeId,
      encodedIframeContent = options.encodedIframeContent,
      iframeWrapperId = options.iframeWrapperId,
      initialResizeCallback = options.initialResizeCallback,
      iframeCSSId = "dynamic_iframe_CSS";
      iframeOverriddenCSSId = options.overriddenCSSId;
    
  this.createIframe = function() {
    var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
    iframe.id = iframeId;
    iframe.className = "ap_never_hide";
    iframe.width = "100%";
    iframe.scrolling = "no";
    iframe.frameBorder = "0";
    onloadFn = this.iframeload;
    
    if ( iframe.addEventListener )
      iframe.addEventListener("load", onloadFn, false);
    else if ( iframe.attachEvent )
      iframe.attachEvent("onload", onloadFn);
    else iframe.onload = onloadFn;
    
    var wrapper = document.getElementById(iframeWrapperId);
    wrapper.innerHTML = '';
    iframe = wrapper.appendChild(iframe);
    
    var overriddenCSS = "";
    if (document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId)) {
    	overriddenCSS = document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId).innerHTML;
    }
    
    var doc = iframe.contentWindow.document || iframe.contentDocument;
    if (doc && doc.open) {
      doc.open();

      doc.writeln('<html><body><style class="text/css">' + document.getElementById(iframeCSSId).innerHTML + overriddenCSS + '</style><div id="iframeContent">' + 
              '' + decodeURIComponent(encodedIframeContent) + '</'+'div>'+'</'+'body></html>');
      doc.close();
    }
  }
  
  this.iframeload = function () {
    var iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
    iframe.style.display = '';
    setTimeout(function () {
      setIframeHeight(initialResizeCallback);
    }, 20); 
  }
  
  function getDocHeight(doc) {
    var contentDiv = doc.getElementById("iframeContent");
    
    return Math.max(
    	contentDiv.scrollHeight,
    	contentDiv.offsetHeight,
    	contentDiv.clientHeight
    );
  }
  
  function setIframeHeight(resizeCallback) {
    var iframeDoc, iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
    iframeDoc = iframe.contentWindow.document || iframe.contentDocument;
    if (iframeDoc) {
      var h = getDocHeight(iframeDoc);
      if (h && h != 0) {
        iframe.style.height = parseInt(h) + 'px';
        if(typeof resizeCallback == "function") {
          resizeCallback(iframeId);	
        }
      } else if (nTries < MAX_TRIES) {
        nTries++;
        setTimeout(function () {
            setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);
        }, 50);
      }
    }
  }
  
  this.resizeIframe = function(resizeCallback) {
    nTries = 0;
	setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);
  }
}

return DynamicIframe;
});
      </script>
     </div>

       P.when('DynamicIframe').execute(function(DynamicIframe){
	var BookDescriptionIframe = null,
	    bookDescEncodedData = "%3Cdiv%3E%3Cp%3EGet%20a%20comprehensive%2C%20in-depth%20introduction%20to%20the%20core%20Python%20language%20with%20this%20hands-on%20book.%20Based%20on%20author%20Mark%20Lutz%26%238217%3Bs%20popular%20training%20course%2C%20this%20updated%20fifth%20edition%20will%20help%20you%20quickly%20write%20efficient%2C%20high-quality%20code%20with%20Python.%20It%26%238217%3Bs%20an%20ideal%20way%20to%20begin%2C%20whether%20you%26%238217%3Bre%20new%20to%20programming%20or%20a%20professional%20developer%20versed%20in%20other%20languages.%20%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cp%3E%20Complete%20with%20quizzes%2C%20exercises%2C%20and%20helpful%20illustrations%2C%20%20this%20easy-to-follow%2C%20self-paced%20tutorial%20gets%20you%20started%20with%20both%20Python%202.7%20and%203.3%26%238212%3B%20the%20latest%20releases%20in%20the%203.X%20%20and%202.X%20lines%26%238212%3Bplus%20all%20other%20releases%20in%20common%20use%20today.%20You%26%238217%3Bll%20also%20learn%20some%20advanced%20language%20features%20that%20recently%20have%20become%20more%20common%20in%20Python%20code.%20%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cul%3E%3Cli%3EExplore%20Python%26%238217%3Bs%20major%20built-in%20object%20types%20such%20as%20numbers%2C%20lists%2C%20and%20dictionaries%20%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli%3ECreate%20and%20process%20objects%20with%20Python%20statements%2C%20and%20learn%20Python%26%238217%3Bs%20general%20syntax%20model%20%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli%3EUse%20functions%20to%20avoid%20code%20redundancy%20and%20package%20code%20for%20reuse%20%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli%3EOrganize%20statements%2C%20functions%2C%20and%20other%20tools%20into%20larger%20components%20with%20modules%20%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli%3EDive%20into%20classes%3A%20Python%26%238217%3Bs%20object-oriented%20programming%20tool%20for%20structuring%20code%20%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli%3EWrite%20large%20programs%20with%20Python%26%238217%3Bs%20exception-handling%20model%20and%20development%20tools%20%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli%3ELearn%20advanced%20Python%20tools%2C%20including%20decorators%2C%20descriptors%2C%20metaclasses%2C%20and%20Unicode%20processing%20%3C%2Fli%3E%3C%2Ful%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E",
	    bookDescriptionAvailableHeight,
	    minBookDescriptionInitialHeight = 112,
	    options = {};
	    
    function resizeCallback() {
       	var bdOffsetTop = document.getElementById("bookDescription_feature_div").offsetTop;
   		var imageBlockOffsetTop = document.getElementById("booksImageBlock_feature_div").offsetTop;
   		var imageBlockHeight = document.getElementById("booksImageBlock_feature_div").offsetHeight;
   		bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = imageBlockOffsetTop + imageBlockHeight -bdOffsetTop - 30;
   		if(bookDescriptionAvailableHeight < minBookDescriptionInitialHeight) {
   	        bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = minBookDescriptionInitialHeight;
   		}
    		
    	var psTotalHeight = document.getElementById("postBodyPS").offsetHeight;

    	if(psTotalHeight > bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 30){
    		if(document.getElementById("bdSeeLessPrompt").style.display == "none"){
    	    	document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 'px';
    	    	document.getElementById("psPlaceHolder").style.display ="block";
    	    	document.getElementById("bdSeeAllPrompt").style.display ="block";
    		}
    		else{
    			document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';
    		}
        }
        else{
        	document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';
        	document.getElementById("psPlaceHolder").style.display ="none";
        	document.getElementById("bdSeeAllPrompt").style.display ="block";
	    	document.getElementById("bdSeeLessPrompt").style.display ="none";
	    	document.getElementById("bdExpanderIcon").className = document.getElementById("bdExpanderIcon").className.replace("rotate","");
        }
    }
	    
	options.iframeId = "bookDesc_iframe";
	options.iframeWrapperId = "bookDesc_iframe_wrapper";
	options.overriddenCSSId = "bookDesc_override_CSS";
	options.encodedIframeContent = bookDescEncodedData;
	options.initialResizeCallback = resizeCallback;
	
	BookDescriptionIframe = new DynamicIframe(options);
	BookDescriptionIframe.createIframe();
	    
	if ((typeof BookDescriptionIframe != 'undefined') && (BookDescriptionIframe instanceof DynamicIframe)) {
	  P.when('jQuery').execute(function($) {
	    $(window).resize(function() {
	        BookDescriptionIframe.resizeIframe(resizeCallback);
	    });
	    $(window).bind('imageResize', function() {
	    	BookDescriptionIframe.resizeIframe(resizeCallback);
	    });
	  });
	}
});
      </script>

     amznJQ.available('jQuery', function() {
    window.sitbWeblab = '';
    if (typeof(Vellum) == 'undefined') {
        Vellum = {
            js: "http://z-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/digital/sitb/reader/v4/201403261048/en_US/sitb-library-js._V339820805_.js",
            sj: "/gp/search-inside/js?locale=en_US&version=201403261048",
            css: "http://z-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/digital/sitb/reader/v4/201403261048/en_US/sitb-library-css._V339820804_.css",
            pl: function(){Vellum.lj(Vellum.js, Vellum.sj, Vellum.css)},
            lj: function(u,u2,uc){
                if (window.vellumLjDone) return;
                window.vellumLjDone = true;
                var d = document;
                var s = d.createElement('link');
                s.type = 'text/css';
                s.rel = 'stylesheet';
                s.href = uc;
                d.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(s);
                s = d.createElement('script');
                s.type = 'text/javascript';
                s.src = u2;
                d.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(s);
            },
            lj2: function(u) {
                var d = document;
                var s = d.createElement('script');
                s.type = 'text/javascript';
                s.src = u;
                d.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(s);
            },
            go: function(){
                sitbLodStart = new Date().getTime();
                jQuery('body').css('overflow', 'hidden');
                var jqw = jQuery(window);
                var h = jqw.height();
                var w = jqw.width();
                var st = jqw.scrollTop();

                jQuery('#vellumShade').css({ 'top' : st, 'height' : h, 'width' : w }).show();

                var vli = jQuery('#vellumLdgIco');
                var nl = (w/2)-(vli.width()/2);
                var nt = st + (h/2) - (vli.height()/2);
                vli.css({"left" : nl, "top" : nt }).show();
                setTimeout("Vellum.x()", 20000);
                Vellum.pl();
            },
            x: function(){
                jQuery('#vellumMsgTxt').html("An error occurred while trying to show this book.");
                jQuery('#vellumMsgHdr').html("Server Timeout");
                jQuery('#vellumMsg').show();
                var reftagImage = new Image();
                reftagImage.src = '/gp/search-inside/reftag/ref=rdr_bar_jsto';
            },
            h: function() {
                jQuery('#vellumMsg').hide();
                jQuery('#vellumShade').hide();
                jQuery('#vellumLdgIco').hide();
                jQuery("body").css('overflow', 'auto');
            },
            cf: function(a) {
                return function() {v.mt = a; v.rg = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments); v.go()}
            },
            c: function(a) {
                var v = Vellum;
                v.mt = 'c'; v.rg = [a]; v.pl();
            }
        }
    
        var f = "opqr".split('');
        for (var i in f) {
            var v = Vellum;
            v[f[i]] = v.cf(f[i]);
        }
        sitbAsin = '1449355730';
        SitbReader = {
            LightboxActions: {
                openReader: function(r) {Vellum.o('1449355730', r); return false},
                openReaderToRandomPage: function(r) {Vellum.r('1449355730', r); return false},
                openReaderToSearchResults: function(q,r) {Vellum.q('1449355730',q,r); return false},
                openReaderToPage: function(p,t,r) {Vellum.p('1449355730',p,t,r); return false}
            }
        }
    }

    amznJQ.onCompletion('amznJQ.criticalFeature', function() { Vellum.c('1449355730') } );
  });

           <script type="text/javascript">
            function acrPopoverHover(e, h) {
        if(h) window.acrAsinHover = e;
        else if(window.acrAsinHover == e) window.acrAsinHover = null;
      }

  amznJQ.onReady('popover', function() {
    (function($) {
      if($.fn.acrPopover) return;
      var popoverConfig = {
        showOnHover:true,
        showCloseButton: true,
        width: null,
        location:'bottom',
        locationAlign:'left',
        locationOffset:[-20,0],
        paddingLeft: 15,
        paddingBottom: 5,
        paddingRight: 15,
        group: 'reviewsPopover',
        clone:false,
        hoverHideDelay:300
      };

      $.fn.acrPopover = function() {
          return this.each(function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            if(!$this.data('init') && typeof $this.amazonPopoverTrigger === 'function') {
              $this.data('init', 1);
              var getargs = $this.attr('getargs');
              var ajaxURL = '/gp/customer-reviews/common/du/displayHistoPopAjax.html?' +
                         '&ASIN=' + $this.attr('name') +
                         '&link=1' +
                         '&seeall=1' +
                         '&ref=' + $this.attr('ref') +
                         ((typeof getargs != 'undefined') ? ('&getargs=' + getargs) : '');
              var myConfig = $.extend(true, { destination: ajaxURL }, popoverConfig);
              $this.amazonPopoverTrigger(myConfig);

              var w = window.acrAsinHover;
              if(w && $(w).parents('.asinReviewsSummary').get(0) == this) {
                $this.trigger('mouseover.amzPopover');
                window.acrAsinHover = null;
              }
            }
        });
      };

      window.reviewHistPopoverConfig = popoverConfig;
      var jqInit = window.jQueryInitHistoPopovers = function(asin) {
        if (typeof $('.acr-popover[name=' + asin + ']').acrPopover === 'function') {
          $('.acr-popover[name=' + asin + ']').acrPopover();
        }
      };
      window.doInit_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onAjaxUpdate_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onCacheUpdate_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;
      window.onCacheUpdateReselect_average_customer_reviews = jqInit;

      amznJQ.onCompletion('amznJQ.criticalFeature', function() {
          setTimeout(function() { amznJQ.declareAvailable('acrPopover'); }, 10);
      });
    })(jQuery);
  });
  amznJQ.onReady('acrPopover', function() {
    jQuery('.acr-popover,#searchTemplate .asinReviewsSummary').each(function() {
      if (typeof jQuery(this).acrPopover === 'function') {
        jQuery(this).acrPopover();
      }
    });
  });
           </script>

    <div class="bucket" id="productDescription">
     <h2>
      Editorial Reviews
     </h2>
     <div class="content">
      <h3 class="productDescriptionSource">
       Book Description
      </h3>
      <div class="productDescriptionWrapper">
       Powerful Object-Oriented Programming
       <div class="emptyClear">
       </div>
      </div>
      <h3 class="productDescriptionSource">
       About the Author
      </h3>
      <div class="productDescriptionWrapper">
       <div>
        <p>
         <b>
          Mark Lutz
         </b>
         is a leading Python trainer, the author of Pythonâ€™s earliest and best-selling texts, and a pioneering figure in the Python world.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Mark is the author of the three Oâ€™Reilly books:
         <i>
          Learning Python
         </i>
         ,
         <i>
          Programming Python
         </i>
         , and
         <i>
          Python Pocket Reference
         </i>
         , all currently in fourth or fifth editions. He has been using and promoting Python since 1992, started writing Python
         <i>
          books
         </i>
         in 1995, and began teaching Python
         <i>
          classes
         </i>
         in 1997. As of Spring 2013, Mark has instructed 260 Python training sessions, taught roughly 4,000 students in live classes, and written Python books that have sold 400,000 units and been translated to at least a dozen languages.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Together, his two decades of
         <i>
          Python
         </i>
         efforts have helped to establish it as one of the most widely used programming languages in the world today. In addition, Mark has been in the software field for 30 years. He holds BS and MS degrees in computer science from the University of Wisconsin where he explored implementations of the Prolog language, and over his career has worked as a professional software developer on compilers, programming tools, scripting applications, and assorted client/server systems.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Mark maintains a training website (
         <i>
          http://learning-python.com
         </i>
         ) and an additional book support site on the Web (
         <i>
          http://www.rmi.net/~lutz
         </i>
         ).
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="emptyClear">
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
     amznJQ.onCompletion('amznJQ.criticalFeature', function () {
  amznJQ.available('jQuery',function(){
    jQuery("#pd-available").trigger("pdAvailable");
  });
});
    </script>

          <h3 class="a-spacing-small">
           Most Helpful Customer Reviews
          </h3>
          <div class="a-section" id="revMHRL">
           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R2QLF1WBN9JBAN">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              80 of 85 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R2QLF1WBN9JBAN/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=1449355730&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="3.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-3">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R2QLF1WBN9JBAN/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=1449355730&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                A great reference, but not a tutorial
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/A2E3F04ZK7FG66/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                calvinnme
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="cr-popup" data-cr-popup='{"width":340,"title":"AmazonHelp","height":340}' style="display:inline;">
               <span class="a-size-micro">
                <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_bdg_help?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=14279681&amp;pop-up=1#hf">
                 <span class="a-color-link c7yBadgeAUI c7yTopDownDashedStrike a-text-bold">
                  HALL OF FAME
                 </span>
                </a>
               </span>
               <span class="a-letter-space">
               </span>
               <span class="a-letter-space">
               </span>
               <span class="a-size-micro">
                <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_bdg_help?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=14279681&amp;pop-up=1#tr">
                 <span class="a-color-link c7yBadgeAUI c7yTopDownDashedStrike a-text-bold">
                  TOP 500 REVIEWER
                 </span>
                </a>
               </span>
               <span class="a-letter-space">
               </span>
               <span class="a-letter-space">
               </span>
               <span class="a-size-micro">
                <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_bdg_help?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=14279681&amp;pop-up=1#vn">
                 <span class="a-color-link c7yBadgeAUI c7yTopDownDashedStrike a-text-bold">
                  VINE VOICE
                 </span>
                </a>
               </span>
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on August 10, 2013
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R2QLF1WBN9JBAN">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Paperback
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              I like how O'Reilly breaks out its PERL books. There is "Learning PERL" for beginners, "Programming PERL" as a reference, and "PERL Cookbook" for solutions. Alas, this book, a weighty tome that makes the dictionary look skinny, should really be renamed "Programming Python". It's a great reference, but good luck trying to learn Python succinctly and from scratch. It's like trying to learn English by reading the dictionary. I'll give it 3 out of 5 on correctness and completeness, but like trying to buy a pair of shoes at a giant Megamart with no department signs, you'll eventually just get frustrated and leave.
             </div>
            </div>
            <a class="a-link-normal comment-link" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R2QLF1WBN9JBAN/ref=cm_cr_dp_cmt?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=1449355730&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books#wasThisHelpful" title="5">
             5 Comments
            </a>

           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R3GGS3UFIO1CME">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              47 of 48 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R3GGS3UFIO1CME/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=1449355730&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="5.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R3GGS3UFIO1CME/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=1449355730&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                Finally the book that got me going!
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/AASELPO5TKIX7/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                mattiasostmar
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on September 7, 2013
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R3GGS3UFIO1CME">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Kindle Edition
              <i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator">
              </i>
             </span>
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">
              Verified Purchase
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              I was a total noob that wanted to learn to program and was advised to learn Python, since I want to do some text analysis. I started out with Learn Python the Hard Way (to mind numbing), tried CodeCademy.com (to general) and watched a lot of videos on youtube (too fragmented) and read a lot of different specialized books on Python (like Python for Data Analysis). THIS book is finally the one that step-by-step in a good old school-teacher way is the perfect fit for me. Gentle, start at page 1 and go one page at the time forward - and it all makes sense and is perfectly balanced.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              I strongly recommend this book for anyone that is absolutely new to programming and have no ambitions to be a programmer, but only yo learn to use code as a tool.
             </div>
            </div>
            <a class="a-link-normal comment-link" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R3GGS3UFIO1CME/ref=cm_cr_dp_cmt?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B00DDZPC9S&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books#wasThisHelpful" title="1">
             1 Comment
            </a>

           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R1E1XAIEURNMEL">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              28 of 29 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R1E1XAIEURNMEL/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=1449355730&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="5.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R1E1XAIEURNMEL/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=1449355730&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                Learning Python - Powerful Object Oriented Programming by Mark Lutz, O'Reilly Media
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/A2V3XH2QRUCECD/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                Aleksander B. Hansen
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="cr-popup" data-cr-popup='{"width":340,"title":"AmazonHelp","height":340}' style="display:inline;">
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on July 14, 2013
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R1E1XAIEURNMEL">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Paperback
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              <span class="MHRHead">
               In the 5th edition of this book, author Mark Lutz takes you on a comprehensive tour of the Python language. In this book he covers a lot of ground, and does so in an easy-to-understand way, making this book great for beginners, or for someone coming from another language. Moreover this book covers both Python 2.7.X and 3.X which is a big plus.
               <br/>
               <br/>
               Learning Python lives up to its title: after reading this book, someone new to programming altogether will walk away with a solid understanding of the Python language basics, including some advanced features. As mentioned this book covers a lot of ground, which is to be expected when it is 1600 pages long, however, it does so in an engaging manner. The author manages to convey the more complex concepts in a good way by breaking them down and walking you through a large range of examples. Furthermore, the writing style is very clear and it is obvious from the text that this author has a lot of experience teaching classes on Python as he seems to "preempt" any confusion before it arises.
               <br/>
               <br/>
               Compared to similar books, Learning Python goes deeper into each topic, and covers more topics than any one "Learning" or beginners' book that I have seen. I believe that's a real plus, as you are not left hanging with questions regarding a topic as one sometimes might be when reading books that just scratches the surface and gives a brief example of some language feature. Even though this book is appropriate for beginners, it introduces what is sometimes thought of as more advanced topics, such as list comprehensions, decorators, descriptors and generators. It is nice to see these features and more included in this comprehensive text as they have become more prevalent recently.
              </span>
              <span class="a-declarative" data-action="columnbalancing-showfullreview" data-columnbalancing-showfullreview="{&quot;rest&quot;:&quot;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;There is only one negative that I can think of with regards to this book, and that is the author's tendency to repeat himself. This is partly due to how the book is organized, and it would benefit from merging similar or identical topics into fewer sections. That is, a topic is covered, and then covered again, and once again but each time the topic is elaborated on more in-depth. Although I understand the idea behind this 'build on what we've learned' style I nevertheless think the book would benefit from having one more \&quot;superficial\&quot; introduction to the topic, and then a single more in-depth look at the topic rather than multiple, briefer in-depth discussions over multiple different sections which partly overlaps with the previous discussion of the topic.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;All in all I would highly recommend this book to someone wanting to learn the Python language, whether a complete newcomer to programming, or a seasoned programmer wanting to pick up the syntax and style. In my opinion it compares favorably to &lt;a class=\&quot;a-link-normal\&quot; href=\&quot;http://www.amazon.com/Think-Python-Allen-B-Downey/dp/144933072X/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk\&quot;&gt;Think Python&lt;/a&gt;  as well as &lt;a class=\&quot;a-link-normal\&quot; href=\&quot;http://www.amazon.com/Introduction-Computation-Programming-Using-Python/dp/0262519631/ref=cm_cr_dp_asin_lnk\&quot;&gt;Introduction to Computation and Programming Using Python&lt;/a&gt;.&quot;}">
               <a class="a-link-normal" href="http://www.amazon.com/Learning-Python-Edition-Mark-Lutz/product-reviews/1449355730/ref=cm_cr_dp_text?ie=UTF8&amp;showViewpoints=0&amp;sortBy=byRankDescending#R1E1XAIEURNMEL">
                <span class="a-letter-space">
                </span>
                Read more â€º
               </a>
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>

             Comment

           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R1M30TWBWGVTAU">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              22 of 23 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R1M30TWBWGVTAU/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=1449355730&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="3.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-3">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R1M30TWBWGVTAU/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=1449355730&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                Python doesn't need to be this tedious
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/A1UYH5QX63MGX3/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                Resmai
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on November 28, 2013
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R1M30TWBWGVTAU">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Paperback
              <i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator">
              </i>
             </span>
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">
              Verified Purchase
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              Another reviewer said that trying to learn Python from this book is like trying to learn english by reading the dictionary, and that couldn't be more true. Each discrete topic is covered in minute detail, so it isn't until page 500 or so of this 1500+ page book that you will have covered enough of the basics to write even a simple program. One of Python's strongest selling points is that it's easy to jump in and get programming right away, regardless of prior knowledge, so this book's approach is a major turn-off for anyone that wants to learn through practice and experience.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              Speaking of which, readers will need to have at least some previous programming experience to make sense of this book, since it relies heavily on jargon that complete beginners are unlikely to understand. If you don't already know what functions, methods, strings, and such are (and experienced programmers here will laugh, but when you are first starting out, such terms can be confusing!) the author isn't going to explain, or if he does, it will be 200 pages later in a different section.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              A more minor complaint is the dry and formal, textbook-like voice of the author. I don't need to be constantly entertained while learning, but I do need to have fun, and a little humor and personality go a long way.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              I'm over a hundred pages in, and I give up. I need to actually program while learning to program. I was looking for a beginner friendly, tutorial style book that would encourage exploration and test my knowledge with quizzes. This isn't it. I think I will go back to my severely outdated copy of Beginning Python by Magnus Lie Hetland to brush up on basic program construction, then use this book as a reference as I get deeper into programming with Python.
             </div>
            </div>
            <a class="a-link-normal comment-link" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R1M30TWBWGVTAU/ref=cm_cr_dp_cmt?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=1449355730&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books#wasThisHelpful" title="2">
             2 Comments
            </a>

           <div class="a-section" id="rev-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R2A59SF0QZPTM3">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro">
             <span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary">
              39 of 47 people found the following review helpful
             </span>
             <div class="a-icon-row a-spacing-none">
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R2A59SF0QZPTM3/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=1449355730&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books" title="2.0 out of 5 stars">
               <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-2">
               </i>
              </a>
              <span class="a-letter-space">
              </span>
              <a class="a-link-normal a-text-normal a-color-base" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R2A59SF0QZPTM3/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=1449355730&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books">
               <span class="a-size-base a-text-bold">
                Repetitios and very hard to use book.
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="a-color-secondary">
              <span class="a-size-normal">
               <span class="a-color-secondary">
                By
               </span>
               <a class="noTextDecoration" href="/gp/pdp/profile/A1EICG510P4JZT/ref=cm_cr_dp_pdp">
                Dmitriy Krasnikov
               </a>
              </span>
              <span class="a-color-secondary">
               on August 12, 2013
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-small" id="revData-dpReviewsMostHelpfulAUI-R2A59SF0QZPTM3">
             <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary">
              Format: Paperback
             </span>
             <div class="a-section">
              It's been awhile since I read something that badly written in computer books.
              <br/>
              Don't get me wrong the guy knows his stuff and there is a lot of information hidden in there.
              <br/>
              Unfortunately it is truly hidden in unnecessary repetitions and fluff.
              <br/>
              It is not a book or reference or tutorial, this is something like a notes from Mark Lutz class, that he teaches. While in the class it is totally ok to revisit previous topics or not get distracted by advanced concepts in the book repetition and "I'll talk about it later" becomes super painful. Dear author, It's the book I can re-read previous topics as needed, there is no need to repeat it 20 times (and this is not an exaggeration).
              <br/>
              In fact the most used phrase- which you will meet on average twice per page is "more on * later" and "as we discussed previously/(in chapter *)". If you don't believe me do a regular expression search on it.
              <br/>
              This book would've been so much better if it was 1/5 in size with topics staying together (we have 3 places/chapters for strings in different places in the book and don't even get me started on classes presentation structure).
              <br/>
              Also it looks a little biased toward 2.6 version and old ways (% vs format for instance), the very important point of being able to re-use positional anchor with format statement is not even mentioned as an advantage "{0}={0}.value".format("var") for example cannot do it with % have to type "var" twice.
             </div>
            </div>
            <a class="a-link-normal comment-link" href="http://www.amazon.com/review/R2A59SF0QZPTM3/ref=cm_cr_dp_cmt?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=1449355730&amp;nodeID=283155&amp;store=books#wasThisHelpful" title="0">
             Comment
            </a>
            <i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator">
            </i>
            <a id="R2A59SF0QZPTM3.2115.Helpful.Reviews">

        setCSMReq('cf');

        uet('cf');
